18.18: mi-Kaa-yaa cvj kxvq, “Navq naaiq, mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b! yia pwatg zyruq zweid ninb Eei huvb weig, yaag pwatg kub vwaaig luvb Eei zwavj finb myenb sruq Jyenq ninb Eei zaaij mcvj, Byaaug mcvj.
18.8: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb heug taub Jyen taaib zyrug kxvq, “mivb txb im-laa Eei txn, mi-Kaa-yaa, syepg syepq Eei taaib maa'b!”
18.33: mq paag maaib taub myenb krub mweig pwrnq yetg Ritq fxv yaag zu'g i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb yem ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei zxvb zu'q yetg Kwaaiq yetg Kwaaiq Eei Bu'Dovb Qavj. huvb tiaj zyrug Buaj zaavq ninb Eei Zia uaq taub, “taauj Zia Tx yia Zwrtq Bx'q Jaaj Zyavq. yia zu'g mun mig a'q.”
18.3: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg, naaig yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq, “meib Zauj yia mivb Bx'q laa-motq-ki-le-aatg fai?” ye-ho-saa-fatq tau ninb, “yia se Navq meib nx. yia Eei pc'g fivj yaag Navq meib Eei pc'g fivj.
18.32: Bx'q Jaaj Zia Eei pcvb pyeiq pwatg maiq zeid i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ninb Bua zyrug taauj Zia, maiq zung ye-ho-saa-fatq a'q.
18.21: “ninb kxvq, ‘yia xij mivb zruj pun ninb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb kxvb pc'g.’ “zyruq cvj kxvq, ‘Navq naaig meib za'kevb haib Duaq tu'q zu'g ninb a'q. kunq mivb zruj maa'b!’
18.14: mivb Tauj huvb tiaj uaq zang, huvb tiaj naaig ninb, “mi-Kaa-yaa aag, yia Bua mivb Bx'q laa-motq-ki-le-aatg hxpg fai maiq hxpg?” mi-Kaa-yaa tau, “kunq mivb Bx'q yaag Bx'q tu'q hivb. ninb Bua xij zu'g yem huvb tiaj Eei puab Diaq.”
18.23: Ke-naa-aa-naa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa, mivb Tauj, Baij mi-Kaa-yaa Eei Myen yaag naaig ninb, “zyruq Eei sivj livb Zwrtq yia yavb haaij mivb Zauj meib kxvq waag lcb?”
18.6: mq paag ye-ho-saa-fatq naaig, “yem naaiq maiq maaib zyruq Eei kanb taub trug waag myenb yia Bua haib naaig ninb fai?”
18.34: uaq Nxi zyavb Nxi Bx'q Jaaj Niaq Eei. ninb Bua yaag sevb Jyenq huvb tiaj yem ninb Eei Zia ka'Euad Win mavg Jyenq aa-lam myenb Tauj luvb Mwavj. luvb maanb Mwavj ninb taig mig a'q.
18.2: Jiaj liud ziaj Havj, ye-ho-saa-fatq mivb saa-maa-lia Zauj aa-hapg Ryaaug. aa-hapg weig ye-ho-saa-fatq Zauj kan ninb mivb Eei myenb taij pa'ki yuvb Zauj vovb Zamq Eei. aa-hapg zyrug yua'g ye-ho-saa-fatq Zauj ninb mivb Bx'q laa-motq-ki-le-aatg.
18.20: Ga'haaq maaib taub Zwrtq taaib sruq Jyenq zyruq Eei Ra'Myen kxvq, ‘yia xij Duaq ninb mivb.’ “zyruq naaig ninb, ‘meib xij lovg haiq Euvg za'eij?’
18.24: mi-Kaa-yaa tau, “meib pia'g pyauq ka'Euad Eei yetg Qovj weig pivj Jyenq uaq Nxi meib zyrug tu'q pwatg a'q.”
18.28: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq, zyrug mivb laa-motq-ki-le-aatg.
18.7: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb tau ye-ho-saa-fatq, “Zxg maaib taub myenb, se im-laa Eei txn, mi-Kaa-yaa. Bua haib Toq ninb Tevj Bua naaig zyruq. mq paag yia Rxv ninb weig zu'g ninb maiq trug Jiaj lovj Eei Jauq pun yia, Kuvj kxvq Zyruq Eei sig Navq.” ye-ho-saa-fatq kxvq, “huvb tiaj maiq tuvq Navq naaig kxvq.”
18.29: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb kxvq Buaj ye-ho-saa-fatq, “pia'g mivb Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog yia zxv Navq penj kanb taub mq paag meib zxv Jyenq meib Eei huvb lwib Daauq.” i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb zyrug zxv penj kanb taub, pia'g mivb Bx'q Jaaj.
18.19: zyruq kxvq, ‘haiq taub xij Duaq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg, mivb laa-motq-ki-le-aatg, yem uaq zu'g taig?’ “maaib taub Navq naaiq nx kxvq, maaib taub Navq uaq nx kxvq.
18.17: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb kxvq Buaj ye-ho-saa-fatq, “yia kxvq Jiaj Buaj meib maiq zeid? naaiq taub maiq trug Jiaj lovj Eei waag pun yia. ninb Kuvj trug Zyruq Eei waag Navq.”
18.31: Bx'q Jaaj Zia Eei pcvb pyeiq pwatg ye-ho-saa-fatq ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq taub za'kevb i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb.” ninb Bua zyrug taauj sin mivb Bx'q ninb. mq paag ye-ho-saa-fatq heug. zyruq cvj Tevj ninb a'q. Tinb huvb txb ninb Bua leib Gxi ninb a'q.
18.30: si-lia Eei huvb Paaiq ninb Eei Bx'q Jaaj Zia Eei pcvb pyeiq, “maiq tuvq Zauj haiq taub Bx'q Jaaj maiq kunq Lo faij. Kuvj Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Bx'q Navq.”
18.27: mi-Kaa-yaa kxvq, “sij kxvq meib haib tu'q pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj taaib, se maiq zeid zyruq lovg yia kxvq waag.” ninb cvj kxvq, “zwavj pc'g fivj aag, Toq mwavj lovj og.”
18.11: zwavj trug waag myenb yaag fib Navq Eei trug waag. ninb Bua kxvq, “kunq mivb Bx'q laa-motq-ki-le-aatg zyrug Bx'q hivb, weig zu'g zyruq xij zx'q uaq nxm zivb Jiu pun yem huvb tiaj Eei puab Diaq.”
18.5: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb zyrug heug trug waag myenb taaib kapq zunq, maaib feij pc'q taub. huvb tiaj zyrug naaig kaaj ninb Bua, “yia Bua hxpg zu'g mivb Bx'q laa-motq-ki-le-aatg fai maiq hxpg zu'g mivb?” ninb Bua tau, “kunq mivb a'q. weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij zx'q uaq nxm zivb Jiu pun yem huvb tiaj Eei puab Diaq.”
18.9: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq, yem saa-maa-lia Eei zivb kcvb Daavg, Bx'q Byaub Eei Zyavq. kx'g myenb zweid Jyenq huvb weig yaag zxv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei huvb lwi. zwavj trug waag myenb yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen trug waag.
18.16: mi-Kaa-yaa zyrug kxvq, “yia pwatg i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Raanj mivb yem Bov Navq pa'ki yuvb kwanb maiq maaib mavg yuvb Eei myenb kruj nx. zyruq yaag kxvq, ‘naaiq teij pc'g fivj maiq maaib zyruq. xij zu'g pun ninb Bua kx'g myenb pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq.’+”
18.4: yia Bua zyrug Zauj meib mivb Bx'q Jaaj.” mq paag ye-ho-saa-fatq yaag kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, “Toq naaig zyruq Daavg.”
18.10: Ke-naa-aa-naa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa, lovg Lia'q zruj Jxv. ninb kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib xij lovg naaiq teij Jxv zov si-lia myenb Tauj myetg Revg ninb Bua.’+”
18.22: “ib zang zyruq zruj pun meib Eei naaiq teij trug waag myenb yetg zuvq kxvb pc'g. zyruq zuvq tivg zyavj pun meib xij zu'g tomb ze'g naang.”
18.12: mivb heug mi-Kaa-yaa taaib uaq taub trug fyenj myenb kxvq Buaj ninb, “zwavj trug waag myenb tovb Jruj waag kxvq huvb tiaj xij tu'q lovj. Toq meib Zauj uaq teij tovb Jruj waag kxvq yaag Kuvj kxvq huvb tiaj xij tu'q lovj Navq.”
18.15: mq paag huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia pun meib lcvd Bu'ziaj Rung waag, meib tevq zyruq Eei Buaj Zauj yia Kuvj kxvq zyen waag Navq?”
18.13: mq paag mi-Kaa-yaa kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq lcvd waag, yia Eei Tinb huvb kxvq haiq Euvg, yia zyrug kxvq uaq Euvg Navq.”
18.1: ye-ho-saa-fatq putq zxib haig a'q, maaib mevb taub Lo. ninb Zauj aa-hapg taaq Zivb Jaa weig Jiu zua'g.
18.26: xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘zx'q naaiq taub loq wrnj Jyenq lob, pun uam Zauj Fuaq kauj yuvd Jyenq mcvg Navq, zuaq yia pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj taaib.’+”
18.25: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb kxvq, “zx'q mi-Kaa-yaa fuvj Rwrnj Jiu pun aa-mon scvb zyruq Zauj huvb Eei txn, yo-aatg.

8.18: hi-laam Paaiq teij ninb kanb Eei Ravq Zauj Ravb Jyen, tovb kwenj Kxiq Eei myenb mivb Zauj saa-lo-mxn Eei Ravb Jyen Rcv Ravq mivb Tauj o-fi. ninb Bua txb Duab Zin feij pc'q Mmd zyepg Jxib Jyem Rwrnj saa-lo-mxn huvb uaq.
8.3: saa-lo-mxn mivb haa-matq-soj-Baa yaag Zaavq tu'q mig a'q.
8.8: se tovb i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq haib myetg maiq Revg, Zxg yem teib puv uaq teij myenb Eei zeib fun, saa-lo-mxn aapq zruj kovb prub Niaq Eei nrub Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
8.9: mq paag saa-lo-mxn maiq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g zruj nrub. ninb Bua zruj ninb Eei pcv, zruj Junb pcvb pyeiq, Zauj kunq maab Zia Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, Zauj zaavq maab Zia Eei pcv.
8.7: zevg Fiag Eei hitq-Tai myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb Zauj ye-Butg myenb, tovb maiq zeid i-saa-laa-en myenb,
8.5: ninb cvj Zeij uaq Jiaj Eei Betg-ho-lon zivb Zauj uaq Diaq Eei Betg-ho-lon zivb penj weib wrnq Eei zivb, maaib zivb laatg, maaib laatg kcvb Zauj kcvb sxn.
8.16: yem ninb Bua lyepg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kxnb Do'q Tauj ib Nxi, ninb Bua ei Jyenq saa-lo-mxn Paaiq Eei waag zruj. Navq naaig zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zeij zyavj Revg a'q.
8.17: Ga'haaq saa-lo-mxn mivb e-Dom Eei Kxib Len Eei e-si-on-ke-Be Zauj e-latq.
8.14: ei ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, lyepg taaib Eei leid ninb Paaiq zyavj sai myenb penj yetg kwanb yetg kwanb ziuj ninb Bua Eei kov. ninb yaag Paaiq le-wi myenb paauj Ruv Zev Tinb huvb yaag Tevj sai myenb ziuj ninb Bua Nxib Nxi Qyemj zu'g lovg. ninb yaag Paaiq zyavj zuaq kcvb myenb penj yetg kwanb yetg kwanb zuaq Jyenq taub taub kcvb weig zu'g Tinb huvb Eei myenb, Daa-witq, hatg zyavj xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj.
8.4: ninb Zeij yem teib puvb Waav Eei Tatq-mo zivb Zauj yem haa-matq Zeij taaib weig syru ka'naaiq Eei nxmb nxm zivb.
8.2: Ga'haaq saa-lo-mxn syavb Zeij Jiad tovb hi-laam Jiu pun ninb uaq teij zivb yaag pun i-saa-laa-en myenb yem.
8.6: ninb yaag Zeij Baa-aa-latq zivb Zauj saa-lo-mxn syru ka'naaiq Eei yetg zuvq zivb, cvj Zauj syru Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj zaavq maab Zia Eei pcv Eei yetg zuvq zivb, Zauj ninb maaib Hruq yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj le-Baa-nxn Zauj ninb kunq kxmj Eei kua'q Eei nxmb nxm txvj Zeij Eei Euvb Euvg.
8.13: ninb ziuj mo-se Paaiq zyavj weig Nxib Nxi ziag Eei ka'naaiq, se weig tivb kov Nxi, pia'g syavb Laaj, Zauj yetg Havj Jiaj Eei pua nxm zipq. uaq teij pua nxm zipq se maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq Zauj syru kcvb zwavj Eei zipq Zauj Byxq liub Eei zipq.
8.12: saa-lo-mxn yem ninb Zeij taaib Eei ziab txvb, se yem zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg Zapq Zwrtq Eei txvj Ra'Myen mcvj Eei ziab txvb, fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq pun zyruq.
8.15: ninb Bua ei Jyenq huvb Paaiq zwavj sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb, weig syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq Eei txvj ninb Bua maiq puvj Dxtq.
8.11: saa-lo-mxn txb faa-lo Eei sia'q yem Daa-witq Eei zivb faauj taaib yem saa-lo-mxn weig ninb Zeij uaq nxm huvb ting. saa-lo-mxn kxvq, “yia Eei auq maiq hxpg zu'g yem i-saa-laa-en kua'q Eei huvb, Daa-witq, Eei huvb ting, weig zu'g zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Tauj Jiaj Eei txvj se Zivb Revg.”
8.1: saa-lo-mxn lovg Eig zyepg Havj Zeij zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zauj ninb kanb Eei huvb ting.
8.10: cvj maaib Eig pc'q Mmd zyepg taub zruj saa-lo-mxn huvb Eei tomb Jyen kunq kovb myenb.

33.18: maa-natq-sej kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig, Zauj ninb tauj kauj Jrub ninb Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag, cvj Zauj trug waag myenb tevq zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Eei mevb, kxvq Buaj ninb Eei waag, fiaq Jyenq yem i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb trub taan.
33.8: sij kxvq i-saa-laa-en myenb faij fim, ei Jyenq yia hatg Eei yetg zuvq waag zruj, yaag ei Jyenq yia Eei pru, mo-se, Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq leib latg Zauj livg Zauj leid, yia zuvq maiq pun i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g leib Gxi yia tivg zyavj pun ninb Bua uaq nxm teib puv.”
33.3: ninb cvj Zeij Jiad tovb ninb Eei tia, he-se-Ki-yaa, paaig waaig uaq teij yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj. ninb cvj weig Baa-an zyenb Zeij ziab txvb, yaag zruj aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj, Navq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg, nx. ninb paaij yaag zavg luvb zavg Eei Euvb Euvg.
33.21: aa-mon faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb tu'q Eig zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq i Havj.
33.14: Ga'haaq maa-natq-sej cvj Zeij Jiad Daa-witq Eei zivb Eei ka'Eiag mcvj zivb laatg, yem hxvd ka'Euad ki-hon uamb zivq fai puv mcvj mivb Tauj Byaub kcvb, Wiv Jyenq o-fen teig. ninb cvj pun zivb laatg Lav tu'q Zamq. ninb yaag lyepg Junb pcvb pyeiq yem yu-Daa weib wrnq Eei yetg zuvq zivb.
33.23: mq paag ninb maiq Navq ninb Eei tia, maa-natq-sej, yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen zatq kanb Fiag. aa-mon paamd Eei zwid kunq zruj kunq Lo Jyenq faauj.
33.6: ninb yem Ben-hin-nom hxvd zx'q ninb kanb Eei txn puaq ziag, yaag mavg mcvg, zruj faatq, puvj tiv puvj Jyemj, kaanq hei yaag Bruq kwaaj. ziuj zyruq mavg ninb zruj waaig sig Zamq haig, Zua'q zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig.
33.2: ziuj zyruq mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig. ninb ei Jyenq zyruq zung Zwrtq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj uaq teij fivb fivj myenb zruj kamb Riaq haig Eei sig.
33.20: maa-natq-sej kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq ninb Eei huvb ting ka'Euad. ninb Eei txn, aa-mon, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
33.24: ninb Eei Jyen lomb Rxib Zaavb laavb vcvg ninb, zyrug yem ninb Eei huvb ting taij ninb.
33.7: ninb zx'q ninb zu'g taaib uaq nxm aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj an Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad. se naaiq nxm pyauq zyruq kxvq Buaj Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei txn, saa-lo- mxn, “se naaiq nxm pyauq Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb yia yem fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj kinq Zwrtq taaib lyepg yia kanb Eei mevb weig yetg liud.
33.19: huvb tiaj tauj kauj Eei waag Zauj Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx tau ninb, lyemb ninb maiq kcvb zatq kanb Fiag Eei zyavb hog Eei yetg zuvq zwid Zauj maiq zyepg zua'q zruj Eei sig, Zauj ninb lyepg yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj yaag lyepg aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj Zauj zyenb, fiaq Jyenq trug waag myenb Eei srub taan.
33.17: maiq kunq Navq naaiq, pc'g fivj Zxg yem Lav Eei txvj fovg hxg ziag mq paag Kuvj ziag pun zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Navq.
33.11: weig naaiq zyruq pun si-lia huvb Eei Junb pcvb pyeiq taaib Bx'q yu-Daa. ninb Bua zx'q Jyenq maa-natq-sej, lovg tiuj Kwavj Jyenq ninb yaag lovg tovb si'q limg Dob Jyenq, txb ninb mivb Baa-Bi-lon.
33.5: ninb yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq i nxm laatg ka'Euad Eei txvj weig luvb zavg Eei Euvb Euvg Zeij ziab txvb.
33.9: mq paag maa-natq-sej txb yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb zruj txvg. ninb Bua zyrug zruj x'q sig zuvq kaub Zamq zyruq yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Ra'Myen myetg Eei ziaj nxm kua'q.
33.16: ninb cvj Zeij Jiad zyruq Eei ziab txvb yaag yem uaq fovg hxg ziag weig Jiu Tov yaag weig lcvd zivb. ninb yaag hatg yu-Daa myenb xij zu'g fub suj zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb.
33.4: ninb yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zeij ziaj nxm ziab txvb, se yem zyruq kxvq, “yia xij lyepg yia Eei mevb yetg liud tu'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem,” uaq nxm txvj.
33.10: zyruq Zauj maa-natq-sej Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj kxvq mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj.
33.22: ziuj zyruq mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig zwrtg ninb Eei tia, maa-natq-sej. ninb zavg cvj fovg hxg ziag ninb Eei tia, maa-natq-sej, zruj taaib Eei yetg zuvq miub favj.
33.12: maa-natq-sej zu'g naang zivb Eei zyavb hog, ninb Toq zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Kxb lyenb. ninb yem ninb Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen zatq kanb Fiag Zamq Eei.
33.15: ninb zx'q kanb fivj myenb Eei zyenb kwavg yaag zx'q Gxi yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad Eei miub favj. ninb Zc'q Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ninb yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zeij taaib Eei yetg zuvq ziab txvb kwavg ka'Eiag zi'g zivb.
33.13: ninb tauj kauj Toq Eei zyavb hog, zyruq zipq ninb Jrub Eei waag, yaag mwavj haid ninb tauj kauj, zyrug txb ninb Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, pun ninb kunq ninb Eei kua'q. maa-natq-sej zyrug hiuq tu'q zyruq se Tinb huvb.
33.1: maa-natq-sej faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb tu'q zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Mmd zyepg Mmd Havj.
33.25: mq paag kua'q ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj cvj taij tovb Zaavb laavb vcvg aa-mon huvb uaq teij. ninb Bua cvj lyepg ninb Eei txn, yo-si-yaa, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.

3.3: naaiq se saa-lo-mxn Zeij zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Zi'g Zunj. ziuj lob Nxi Eei Zi'g Zunj, Daauq lua'g zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Dx'g.
3.8: ninb yaag Zeij kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g, se Zauj pyauq fib Fyetq. Javq yaag Eig zyepg Dx'g. ka'Euad pwav Jyenq zyen Jyem. lovg yetg waang pua Zin Jxib Jyem.
3.9: Jyemb tiv Eei Niab taaub se zyepg Mmd luvd. pyauq kub vwaaig uaq teij Qovb Qovj yaag lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq.
3.7: cvj lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq hcvb, kcvb zrug, Fovg Zauj kcvb, yaag tiu Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj yem uaq Fovg.
3.5: ka'Euad Lo Jiaj uaq Qovj lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj weib, cvj lovg zyen Jyem pwav Jyenq, tiu Jyenq taaub Dyavj Zauj limg Eei favj zxv Jyenq.
3.16: ninb Zi'q limg Reng Jyenq Dyrub tweib mweid. ninb cvj zruj yetg pc'q nxm zi'g lyrub pyruq tivj Jyenq naaiq teij limg.
3.17: ninb zx'q naaiq teij i nxm Dyrub lyepg taaib ton Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj. maaib nxm yem naamb puv, maaib nxm yem pa'q puv. naamb puv uaq nxm heug yaa-Kin. pa'q puv uaq nxm heug Bo-aatg.
3.14: ninb lovg pa'ki swij setq Buaq, lua'g, si'q Zauj la'maab Diab mwrng zruj Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia Zovj Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj.
3.4: pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj Eei kcvb Daavg uaq nxm txvj Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g, se Zauj pyauq fib Dovg Javq, Lav Eig zyepg Dx'g. pyauq ka'Euad ninb pwav Jyenq Jyem.
3.2: saa-lo-mxn zruj huvb ta'feij Havj, Eeig Laaj scvb Eeig ninb Jiad kxn Zeij.
3.6: ninb lovg Rweig haig Eei la'pyeib Jaaij zxv pyauq ka'Euad. ninb lovg Eei Jyem se yem paan-waa-im taaib Eei Jyem.
3.13: naaiq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim yav Daatq Eig zyepg Dx'g Daauq. naaiq teij i taub sruq Jyenq, Myen Win mivb kaub Lo Jiaj uaq Qovj.
3.12: ta'Eeig taub Ke-lu-Bim Eei Daatq, yetg puv Daatq pyaa Dx'g Daauq, yav mivb tonj Jyenq Fovg. uaq puv Daatq yaag pyaa Dx'g, Zauj ta'yetq taub Ke-lu-Bim Zamj Jyenq.
3.15: yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj zruj i nxm tomb Dyrub Lav faab zyepg Mmd Dx'g. i nxm Dyrub tweib mweid px'q pyaa Dx'g Lav.
3.11: naaiq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim yav Jyenq Daatq Eig zyepg Dx'g Daauq. yetg taub Eei yetg puv Daatq pyaa Dx'g Daauq yaag yav tonj Jyenq uaq puv Fovg. naaiq taub yav Eei uaq puv Daatq Zauj uaq taub yav Eei naaiq puv Daatq Zamj Jyenq Jaaj.
3.1: saa-lo-mxn zyrug Jiad kxn Zeij zavg zyruq Eei pyauq yem ye-lu-saa-lem, mo-li-yaa Bov, tovb zyruq hing Zwrtq pun ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, uaq nxm txvj. se Daa-witq tivg Eei txvj, ye-Butg myenb, aa-laau-naa, Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq.
3.10: yem kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj ninb zu'g i taub Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq.

32.18: naaiq teij pcvb pyeiq lovg yu-Daa myenb Eei waag heug Bwi Eei kxvq Buaj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb laatg kub vwaaig Eei myenb, xij hc'q ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig zyrug haib Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb.
32.8: Zauj ninb yem Eei se paamb myenb Navq, mq paag Zauj Bua yem uaq taub se zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb, weig Tevj Bua yaag weig Bua Bx'q Jaaj.” pc'g fivj zyrug Kauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, Eei waag tu'q xn Hruq.
32.33: he-se-Ki-yaa kwei seij mig a'q. ninb zavj Jyenq yem Daa-witq Eei zeib fun Eei zrub kemb uaq Jiaj mcvj puv. ninb taig Eei zyavb hog, yu-Daa teig Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb Taaib ninb. ninb Eei txn, maa-natq-sej, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
32.3: ninb zyrug Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Zauj henq haig Eei pcv Zaavb laavb xij zc'q zivb Eei uamb zivq. ninb Bua zyrug Tevj ninb.
32.32: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig Zauj ninb zruj lovj Eei Jauq, fiaq Jyenq aa-mxtq Eei txn, trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, laaug yaavb Eei sig yem i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb trub taan.
32.21: zyruq zyrug Paaiq taub finb myenb pia'g atg-si-lia huvb Eei Zyavq taij Revg ninb henq haig Eei Bx'q Jaaj pcv Zauj ninb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq fiub pcvb pyeiq. atg-si-lia Eei huvb zyrug Eaiq haig, Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei kua'q. ninb pia'g ninb Eei zyenb Eei pyauq uaq zang, maaib teij ninb kanb Eei txn lovg Ru'g Daauq taij ninb a'q.
32.14: yia Eei ovb Taaij myetg Revg uaq teij kua'q Eei haiq taub zyenb tu'q Fruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq yia fai? uaq Euvg meib Bua Eei zyenb haib Fruj meib Bua pyauj Dutq, maiq zu'g yem yia Eei puab Diaq fai?
32.23: myenb Zamq Eei taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem txb ka'naaiq taaib pun zyruq, cvj txb Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq taaib pun yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa. yem naaig taaib maang kua'q myenb Taaib he-se-Ki-yaa weib Lo.
32.6: ninb Paaiq Junb pcvb pyeiq kunq pc'g fivj, cvj heug ninb Bua kapq zunq yem zivb kcvb Eei tomb zwavj zaamg, zyrug lovg naaiq teij waag xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq.
32.2: he-se-Ki-yaa pwatg sen-naa-Ke-lipq taaib Jiad Hruq xij Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem,
32.20: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb Zauj aa-mxtq Eei txn, trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, zyrug weig naaiq teij Jauq mavg Jyenq luvb heug Jyenq tauj kauj.
32.24: uaq teij zyavb hog he-se-Ki-yaa putq pcvg aaq lamb taig a'q. ninb tauj kauj Toq zyruq,  zyruq yaag tau cvj pun nxm Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog.
32.28: ninb zruj lamd syru laavb zi'g, cvj zruj txvj syru syavb a'vung tiuq Zauj ka'lanq yrub. ninb cvj zruj Euvb Euvg scvb Kuq Eei txvj Zauj yuvb laanb.
32.7: “meib Bua xij zu'g henq yaag taamq Lo. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj yaag maiq tuvq Hruq namj laaij atg-si-lia Eei huvb Zauj kan ninb uaq teij yetg zuvq Junb pcv, weig zu'g Zauj Bua yem uaq taub zuvq kaub henq Zauj ninb Bua yem Eei.
32.29: ninb yaag Zeij zivb Zamq Eei yaag tu'q vovb kwanb yuvb kwanb Zamq! haig, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Zeij pun ninb za'kevb! putq zxib haig.
32.19: ninb Bua kxvq ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Tinb huvb Navq ninb Bua kxvq luvb Diaq Eei kanb fivj myenb Eei zyenb, se myenb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei zyenb.
32.17: ninb yaag fiaq fyenj kxvq to'g zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, yaag Navq naaiq nx kxvq ninb, “naaiq teij kua'q Eei zyenb maiq Fruj ninb Bua Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq yia Eei puab Diaq. he-se-Ki-yaa Eei zyenb yaag fib Navq Eei maiq haib Fruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq yia Eei puab Diaq.”
32.31: Navq naaiq nx maaib Baa-Bi-lon Eei tomb Jyen Paaiq taaib Eei kovb zob taaib naaig Tauj yem kua'q zavg Zwrtq Eei Javb hog. Tinb huvb pun ninb sweib ninb kanb Eei Hruq Kauq ninb, xij hiuq tu'q yem ninb Eei Hruq maaib Eei yetg zuvq.
32.30: se tovb he-se-Ki-yaa Zc'q ki-hon uaq Jiaj Eei uamb zivq pun uam lyrug Fiag taaib pia'g Daa-witq Eei zivb. he-se-Ki-yaa zruj haiq Euvg ninb tu'q lovj.
32.27: he-se-Ki-yaa za'kevb! putq zxib haig. haiq taub yaag Taaib ninb. ninb zruj txvj syru ninb Eei Jyem Eaanb Zauj Jaaij Eei la'pyeiq, laapg liug, Txvb paaib Zauj Euvb Euvg Jaaij Eei Jaab sig.
32.11: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb Buaj meib Bua “zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, zuvq xij Fruj yia Bua pyauj Dutq atg-si-lia Eei puab Diaq” uaq teij waag ninb Kuvj Duaq meib Bua, xij pun meib Bua zu'g vxg Naavj Jaav Gaatq taig.
32.5: huvb tiaj lovg Qa'q zruj kov zxg zivb laatg Baav waaig Eei txvj cvj Zeij laaub yem zivb laatg kub vwaaig. yem zivb laatg ka'Eiag mcvj ninb cvj Zeij yemg zivb laatg weib kxmj, cvj Zeij Daa-witq Eei zivb, min-lo, uaq nxm txvj. ninb yaag zruj Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king Zauj Txvb paaib Zamq.
32.9: Ga'haaq atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, Zauj ninb Eei zwavj Junb pcv weib Jyenq laa-Kitq zivb uaq zang, ninb Paaiq ninb Eei pcvb pyeiq mivb yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei yetg zuvq yu-Daa myenb kxvq,
32.16: sen-naa-Ke-lipq Eei Jyen Zxg cvj kxvq Zamb Euvg taanb zyruq Tinb huvb Zauj ninb Eei pru, he-se-Ki-yaa.
32.4: maaib myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq taaib zc'q Revg yetg zuvq uamb zivq Zauj lyrug Jiaj teib puv uaq tiub Do'g txn. ninb Bua kxvq, “fuvg xij zu'g pun atg-si-lia Eei huvb taaib pwatg uam Dovg naaiq Zamq!”
32.10: “atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib Bua Kauj haiq Euvg Zivj taaib yem ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g Junb pcv weib kxmj?
32.22: Navq naaig zyruq Fruj he-se-Ki-yaa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, Eei puab Diaq yaag pyauj Dutq yetg zuvq winb wavq Eei puab Diaq.
32.12: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb kanb Zc'q yem Lav zavg naaiq taub zyenb Eei txvj Zauj ziab txvb, yaag kxvq Buaj meib Bua yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj myenb, “meib Bua Kuvj xij zu'g taaib naaiq nxm Du'g nxm ziab txvb puaq fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq Navq.”
32.15: Navq naaiq nx, maiq tuvq pun he-se-Ki-yaa Duaq meib Bua, pun meib Bua Namq txvg. maiq tuvq syenj ninb, weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq nxm kua'q fai haiq fivj myenb Eei zyenb haib Fruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq yia fai yia Eei ovb Taaij Eei puab Diaq. Navq naaig meib Bua Eei zyenb kaub fatq maiq haib Fruj meib Bua.’+”
32.13: “+‘meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q yia Zauj yia Eei ovb Taaij Navq haiq nx zruj pun kanb kua'q Eei fivb fivj myenb fai? uaq teij kua'q Eei pc'g fivj Eei zyenb haib Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq yia Eei puab Diaq fai?
32.1: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb zyepg zua'q Eei zruj liud naaiq teij sig, Ga'haaq atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq taaib Zaavq pia'g yu-Daa. ninb weib kxmj yetg zuvq maaib zivb laatg wrnq Eei zivb, Namq xij Zaavq taaib penj ninb kanb Eei zivb.
32.26: he-se-Ki-yaa zyrug Eyemq cvj kxiq Hruq kwavg ninb zruj mauj Eei Jauq. weig naaiq yem he-se-Ki-yaa zyavb Eei Nxib Eia'g, zyruq maiq pun ninb Bua zu'g ninb nrud.
32.25: mq paag he-se-Ki-yaa maiq lcvd zyruq Eei zivb en weig zu'g ninb Eei Hruq mauj. weig naaiq zyruq nrud haig ninb Zauj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem.

21.18: naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud, Ga'haaq zyruq pun ye-ho-lam Eei Jaavb putq pcvg, se maiq haib zxg maiq lovj Eei pcvg.
21.3: ninb Bua Eei tia zx'q Jyem Eaanb Zauj Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq Zamq Eei zruj zivb Eeig pun ninb Bua, yaag zx'q yem yu-Daa weib wrnq Eei zivb Jiu pun ninb Bua. mq paag ninb zx'q kua'q Jiu pun ye-ho-lam, weig zu'g ye-ho-lam zruj txnb Lo.
21.8: txij ye-ho-lam zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog, e-Dom myenb vcvg yu-Daa zyrug weig ninb Bua kanb lyepg huvb.
21.19: ninb putq pcvg Kruq Eei pwavq i Havj, Jaavb pctq Zwrtq taaib a'q. setq mweid Eei zyavb hog ninb tiaq Kruq haig Tauj taig mig a'q. pc'g fivj yaag maiq puaq trud weig hrug ninb Navq zinb Daavg puaq trud nx.
21.9: ye-ho-lam zyrug txb ninb Eei Junb pcvb pyeiq Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia mivb Bx'q e-Dom teib puv. e-Dom myenb weib kxmj ninb Zauj ninb zaavq maab Zia Eei pcvb pyeiq. ninb Bua zyrug luvb mwrnd zang Jiad taaib Bx'q Tov pyauj.
21.7: mq paag zyruq weig ninb Zauj Daa-witq lyepg Eei vcvg waag maiq xij myetg Daa-witq Eei trub zov. ninb yaag lcvd pun Daa-witq yetg liud maaib zeib fun zruj huvb.
21.5: ye-ho-lam faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb tu'q faab zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Yetg Havj.
21.16: Ga'haaq zyruq Zo'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb Zauj nitq fatq e-Ti-o-pia uaq teij aa-lapg myenb xij mivb Bx'q ye-ho-lam.
21.20: ye-ho-lam faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb tu'q faab zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Yetg Havj. ninb kwei seij Eei zyavb hog maiq maaib haiq taub Raub ninb. ninb Bua txb mivb zavj yem Daa-witq Eei zivb, mq paag maiq zavj yem huvb tiaj Eei zrub kemb.
21.17: ninb Bua zyrug Bx'q yu-Daa, Zaavq pia'g cvj luq yem huvb ting Eei ka'naaiq, lyemb ninb Eei auq, ninb Eei txn yetg zuvq. Zwrtq liud ninb Eei txnb faij, aa-hatg-yaa, ye-ho-lam maiq zevg yetg taub txn a'q.
21.14: weig naaiq zyruq xij pun meib Eei pc'g fivj, meib Eei auq, meib Eei naamb Erud Zauj meib maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq zu'g tomb ze'g naang.
21.4: ye-ho-lam zweid ninb Eei tia Eei weig lyepg wrnq liud, ninb lovg Ru'g Daauq taij Revg ninb Eei yrud, yaag taij i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei ziaj taub pyeiq zeiq.
21.2: ye-ho-lam maaib Ju'q taub yrud, se ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, ye-hi-en, sej-Kaa-li-yaa, aa-saa-li-yaa-hu, mi-Kaa-en Zauj se-faa-Ti-yaa. naaiq teij yetg zuvq se yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei txn.
21.6: ninb ei Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Eei za'eij, se Navq aa-hapg Eei pyauq Eei myenb, weig zu'g ninb lovg aa-hapg Eei sia'q zruj auq. ziuj zyruq mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig.
21.13: taauj Rwrnj meib kan i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Jauq yavb. meib yaag txb yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj, Navq aa-hapg Eei pyauq zov myenb. meib yaag taij meib Eei yrud, se meib Eei tia Eei trub zov. ninb Bua zuvq kaub lovj meib.
21.12: ye-ho-lam tu'q zipq zeiq trug waag myenb, e-li-yaa, fiaq Eei fyenj. fyenj kxvq, “zyruq, meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq. ‘meib maiq kan meib Eei tia, ye-ho-saa-fatq, fai yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-saaj, Eei Jauq yavb.
21.15: meib kanb xij putq Jaavb Eei pcvg Niaq Eei, yetg Nxi peiq yetg Nxi Kruq, Tauj pcvg zuvq hxig meib Eei Jaavb pctq Zwrtq taaib.’+”
21.11: ninb yaag yem yu-Daa Eei Bov kub vwaaig lyepg zavg zyenb Eei txvj, pun ye-lu-saa-lem myenb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj, yaag pun yu-Daa myenb paamd zwid txvg Tinb huvb.
21.1: ye-ho-saa-fatq kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb Eei txn, ye-ho-lam, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
21.10: Navq naaig e-Dom vcvg Jyenq, maiq pun yu-Daa kunq Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi. uaq zang lipq-naa yaag fib Navq Eei vcvg Jyenq maiq pun yu-Daa kunq, weig zu'g ye-ho-lam kwavg zyruq, ninb Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.

35.18: yem trug waag myenb, saa-mu-en, Eei zyavb hog Tauj uaq zang, yem i-saa-laa-en maiq tu'q Navq naaiq nx Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq. yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv maiq maaib Jiaj yetg taub huvb Navq yo-si-yaa huvb Zauj sai myenb, le-wi myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua yem uaq Eei yu-Daa myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb, lyemb yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb, Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq.
35.8: huvb tiaj Eei Jyen yaag Zwrtq fim pun pc'g fivj Zauj sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb. kunq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei myenb, hin-Ki-yaa, sej-Kaa-li-yaa Zauj ye-hi-en zx'q i Zin lua'g pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yuvb txn Zauj faamb pc'q taub vovb kruq Jiu pun sai myenb weig zruj Jiaj zipq fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
35.3: ninb kxvq Buaj le-wi myenb, se fuvj kanb penj zyruq Eei Zivb Revg myenb, tovb Faauj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq myenb, “zx'q Zivb Revg Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav an Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, Daa-witq Eei txn, saa-lo-mxn, Zeij taaib uaq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. maiq zu'g lovg Ba'taub kcv mivb kcv taaib a'q. ib zang xij zu'g fub suj zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.
35.21: mq paag ne-Ko Paaiq kovb zob mivb kxvq Buaj ninb, “o yu-Daa Eei huvb aa'b! yia Zauj meib maaib haiq Euvg? yia ib Nxi taaib maiq zeid xij Zauj meib Bx'q Jaaj. yia taaib Bx'q tovb Zauj yia Bx'q Jaaj uaq Jauq myenb. Tinb huvb heug yia kaanq a'q. Navq naaig tivb maa'b! maiq tuvq tavq Jyenq Tinb huvb weig zu'g ninb Zauj yia yem. maiq zei c'q, ninb xij pun meib zu'g myetg.”
35.14: Ga'haaq ninb Bua weig kanb yaag weig sai myenb liug leid weig zu'g sai myenb, tovb aa-lon Eei zeib fun, puaq uaq teij fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj Mei Tauj luvb mwrnd zang. le-wi myenb zyrug weig kanb Zauj aa-lon sai myenb Eei zeib fun liug leid.
35.23: pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei myenb pwrnq zu'g yo-si-yaa huvb. ninb zyrug Buaj ninb Eei pru, “txb yia Zwrtq maa'b! yia zu'g syav a'q.”
35.6: xij zu'g taij siaj mcvg zipq Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, saaj kanb Zivb Revg taaib, weig meib Bua Jwavg fivj Eei kxb yrud, i-saa-laa-en myenb, liug leid pa'ki yuvb txn ei Jyenq zyruq lovg mo-se Paaiq Eei waag.
35.2: ninb Paaiq sai myenb, kx'g myenb ziuj kx'g myenb Eei kov zruj, yaag Kwinj ninb Bua yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Jxm Hruq zruj kov fub suj.
35.20: yo-si-yaa liug leid zyavj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq suv Revg, Ga'haaq i-yipq Eei huvb, ne-Ko, taaib Tauj yu-fe-titg Daaib, Kaan-Ke-mitq uaq, Bx'q Jaaj. yo-si-yaa Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj.
35.24: ninb Bua zyrug txb ninb Zwrtq Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia cvj pia'g ninb Eei ta'Eeig nxm Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia fuvj ninb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb zyrug yem uaq taig mig a'q, zavj Jyenq ninb Eei ovb Taaij Eei zruq. yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj myenb weig ninb Raub Eyemq.
35.7: yo-si-yaa Zwrtq fim pun weig yem uaq Eei Prub Tov myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq. ninb pun pua waang taub pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb txn Zauj pua Zin taub vovb kruq. naaiq teij yetg zuvq se yem huvb tiaj Eei pwrng zx'q Zwrtq taaib.
35.19: ninb Bua Jiaj naaiq nxm zipq se yo-si-yaa zruj huvb zyepg petq Havj uaq Havj.
35.17: uaq zang yem uaq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq yaag Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq siag Nxi.
35.27: ninb zruj Eei yetg zuvq, yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, fiaq Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb trub taan.
35.11: le-wi myenb zyrug taij siaj mcvg zipq Eei pa'ki yuvb txn. sai myenb zipq uaq teij Ryaamq taaib fu'q ziab txvb. le-wi myenb mc'q Gxi pa'ki yuvb Eei Dopq.
35.5: “xij zu'g sruq Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei txvj, mrud kwanb le-wi myenb Tevj maiq zeid zruj sai myenb uaq teij, se meib Bua Eei kxb yrud ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng.
35.9: cvj maaib le-wi myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq, Ko-naa-ni-yaa, Zauj se-mai-aa Zauj ninb Eei yrud, Zauj ne-Tan-en, Zauj haa-saa-Bi-yaa Zauj ye-i-en Zauj yo-saa-Baatg, pun pyaa Zin taub pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yuvb txn Zauj Mmd pc'q taub vovb kruq le-wi myenb weig zruj siaj mcvg zipq fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
35.16: tovb uaq Nxi ninb Bua Beng zyavj siaj mcvg zipq fub suj zyruq, yaag yem zyruq Eei ziab txvb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Navq yo-si-yaa huvb Paaiq zyavj nx.
35.4: meib Bua xij zu'g ei Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, Daa-witq, Zauj ninb Eei txn, saa-lo-mxn, fiaq Jyenq Paaiq Eei waag liug leid zyavj ziuj meib Bua Eei puvb pwrng penj yetg kwanb yetg kwanb Eei.
35.10: Jiaj zipq Eei Jaub lrug liug leid zyavj Revg, sai myenb sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei txvj Zauj Jyenq le-wi myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei kwanb Navq huvb tiaj Paaiq nx.
35.22: mq paag yo-si-yaa maiq Kavq leib Gxi ninb. ninb zxv Jaaq penj kanb taub xij Zauj ne-Ko Bx'q Jaaj. ninb maiq mwavj Tinb huvb lovg ne-Ko Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag. ninb Zwrtq mivb me-kitg-Do Eei Daub pcvb Bx'q Jaaj.
35.12: ninb Bua zx'q fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq weig Jiu pun Prub Tov Eei myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng Eei kwanb, Navq fiaq Jyenq mo-se Eei sru fovg hxg pun zyruq. vovb c'q, ninb Bua fib Navq Eei zruj.
35.15: paauj Ruv Eei myenb, se aa-saapg Eei zeib fun, ziuj Daa-witq, aa-saapg, he-maan Zauj Tevj huvb tiaj kxvq zinb hod waag uaq taub ye-Du-Tun, Paaiq Eei waag yem ninb Bua Eei txvj. zuaq kcvb myenb yaag zuaq taub taub kcvb, maiq zu'g kwavg ninb Bua Eei txvj, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud Tevj ninb Bua liug leid zyavj Jiaj zipq.
35.13: ninb Bua ei Jyenq leid lovg trud zi'q siaj mcvg zipq Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, cvj zx'q fovg hxg uaq teij Zivb Revg ka'naaiq lovg tomb Zcv, tomb Zcvb lx Zauj tomb Zcvb Beib zruq yaag syepg syepq Eei fuvj mivb pun zwavj myenb.
35.1: yo-si-yaa yem ye-lu-saa-lem Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq weig Taaib zyruq. zib Laaj zyepg feij uaq Nxi, ninb Bua taij Jiaj zipq Eei pa'ki yuvb txn.
35.26: yo-si-yaa kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig Zauj ninb ei Jyenq zyruq Eei leib latg zruj Eei Kuq sig,
35.25: ye-le-mi weig yo-si-yaa zog Raub Eyemq Eei naang zivb Ruv. Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi paauj Ruv Eei mJavg msia'q paauj naaiq teij naang zivb Ruv weig Javj yo-si-yaa. Navq naaiq zruj yem i-saa-laa-en penj leib fivj a'q, yaag fiaq Jyenq Raub Eyemq Ruv Eei sru.

14.3: ninb zx'q kwavg kanb fivj myenb Eei ziab txvb Zauj yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj. ninb yaag Bx'q huq la'pyeib tovg yaag kxij aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj.
14.8: aa-saaj huvb Eei Junb pcv maaib yu-Daa myenb pua sinj taub nanq tomb Txvb paaib Zauj Zav. yaag maaib Ben-yaa-min myenb i sinj Yetg waang taub nanq fiub Txvb paaib Zauj Jwavb zinj.
14.9: e-Ti-o-pia myenb, ze-laa, Zwrtq taaib Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj. ze-laa maaib zyepg sinj taub Junb pcv yaag maaib faamb pc'q nxm Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia. ninb Zwrtq taaib Tauj maa-le-saa.
14.7: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj yu-Daa myenb, “Bua xij zu'g Zeij naaiq teij zivb, cvj Zeij zivb laatg Zauj laaub weib Jyenq, an Jyenq zivb laatg kcvb Zauj kcvb sxn. teib puv Zxg penj Bua Eei weig zu'g Bua lxd zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb. ninb zyrug pun Bua feij puv Taaib pcvb Eei.” ninb Bua zyrug Zeij zivb. teib puv yaag lovj Jyenq faauj.
14.5: ninb zx'q Gxi yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj Zauj puaq huv tiab. ninb kunq Eei kua'q Taaib pcvb Eei yem.
14.14: weib kxmj ke-laa Eei nxmb nxm muvq Eei myenb kamb Riaj zyruq. yu-Daa Eei Junb pcv zyrug myetg Revg naaiq teij zivb yaag luq Fav Revg, weig zu'g naaiq teij zivb ka'Euad maaib ka'naaiq Zamq haig.
14.4: ninb hatg yu-Daa myenb lxd zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, yaag kan ninb Eei leib latg Zauj livg.
14.2: ziuj zyruq, aa-saaj Eei Tinb huvb mavg, aa-saaj zruj tu'q lovj, zruj tu'q hxpg.
14.6: yem yu-Daa ninb Zeij ziaj nxm weib wrnq Eei zivb, weig zu'g kua'q Taaib pcvb Eei. yem uaq teij Havb taaub maiq maaib haiq taub Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj, weig zu'g zyruq Zeij pcvb xn pun ninb.
14.13: aa-saaj Zauj kan ninb uaq teij Junb pcv zung Jyenq mivb Tauj ke-laa. e-Ti-o-pia myenb zu'g taij taig Zamq! Eei, zuvq maiq maaib yetg taub tu'q Zwrtq sivj mcvg, weig zu'g ninb Bua yem zyruq Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv Eei Ra'Myen zu'g paaig. yu-Daa myenb zyrug Zaavq tu'q ka'naaiq Zamq Eei.
14.12: weig naaiq, zyruq yem aa-saaj Zauj yu-Daa myenb Eei Ra'Myen Bx'q hivb e-Ti-o-pia myenb. e-Ti-o-pia myenb zyrug Tiuj pyauj.
14.15: ninb Bua Bx'q waaig yuvd scvb Kuq Eei myenb Eei Zyavq cvj Zaavq tu'q pa'ki yuvb Zauj lxb Txb Zamq Eei. Ga'haaq ninb Bua Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mig a'q.
14.11: aa-saaj zyrug heug zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb. aa-saaj kxvq, “o zyruq aag, maiq maaib haiq taub Dovg meib haib Tevj mau Eei myenb hivb Jiaj henq Eei uaq teij. o zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq Tevj yia Bua weig zu'g yia Bua Kauj meib. yia Bua tevq meib Eei Buaj taaib Bx'q naaiq teij tomb kwanb pcv. o zyruq aag, meib zruj yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. maiq tuvq pun myenb hivb meib.”
14.1: aa-Bi-yaa huvb kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb Eei txn, aa-saaj, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb. ninb kunq Eei Nxib Eia'g, kua'q Taaib pcvb zyepg Havj.
14.10: aa-saaj Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua i puv zyrug mivb Baib Jyenq sej-faa-Taa hxvd nitq maa-le-saa uaq.

23.18: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Paaiq zuaq kcvb myenb zuaq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq yaag pun ninb Bua yem le-wi sai myenb Eei puab Diaq, tovb Daa-witq tivg zyavj kruj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq yaag ziuj fiaq Jyenq mo-se Eei leib latg fovg hxg ka'naaiq puaq ziag pun zyruq. ninb Bua yaag xij zu'g ziuj Daa-witq Paaiq Eei waag Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv.
23.3: kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj huvb tiaj lyepg Jiad vcvg waag. ye-ho-yaa-Daa kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “mavg maa'b! naaiq se huvb tiaj Eei txn. ninb xij zu'g zruj huvb kunq Navq zyruq kxvq Daa-witq Eei zeib fun xij zu'g kunq nx.
23.8: le-wi myenb Zauj yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq myenb zyrug ei Jyenq ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb Paaiq Eei waag zruj. kx'g myenb txb kanb Eei myenb, se tivb kov Nxi ziuj lwrnb paan pia'g kov fai Zwrtq kov Eei myenb, weig zu'g ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb maiq puvj haiq taub Zwrtq kov.
23.19: ninb yaag Paaiq myenb zuaq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei laatg kcvb, weig maiq pun maaib haiq Euvg wij Eei haiq taub myenb tu'q pia'g.
23.9: ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb zx'q yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zinb Daavg penj Daa-witq huvb Eei Zav Zauj Txvb paaib pun zwavj pcvb pyeiq.
23.7: le-wi myenb xij zu'g weib kxmj huvb tiaj, taub taub nanq Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king. haiq taub pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, xij zu'g taij taig. huvb tiaj pia'g Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog yaag xij zu'g kan Jyenq ninb yem.
23.5: pua kruq Eei yetg kruq xij zu'g zuaq huvb ting, pua kruq Eei yetg kruq xij zu'g zuaq kxnb Do'q uaq taub laatg kcvb. zwavj pc'g fivj xij zu'g yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad.
23.16: ye-ho-yaa-Daa kanb Zauj pc'g fivj Zauj huvb tiaj lyepg Jiad vcvg waag lcvd ninb Bua yetg zuvq xij zruj zyruq Eei pc'g fivj.
23.20: ye-ho-yaa-Daa txb Jyenq kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb Zauj kunq pc'g fivj Eei tomb Jyen Zauj kua'q zavg Eei zwavj myenb. ninb Bua txb huvb tiaj yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Fiag taaib, kan uaq Jiaj Eei kcvb pia'g huvb ting. ninb Bua zyrug pun huvb tiaj zweid Jyenq huvb weig.
23.17: kua'q ka'Euad Eei zwavj pc'g fivj mivb Baa-an zyenb Eei miub pyauq Zc'q Fiag Revg. ninb Bua Bx'q ziab txvb Zauj miub favj huq mwrng Revg yaag yem ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj taij Baa-an zyenb Eei sai myenb, matq-Taan.
23.14: ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb txb kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq Zwrtq taaib kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “txb huvb maag yavb pcv Eei Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib. haiq taub kan huvb maag mivb, xij zu'g lovg Ru'g Daauq taij uaq taub taig.” weig zu'g sai myenb kxvq Jiaj, “maiq tuvq yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq taij huvb maag.”
23.4: meib Bua xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj. Tauj tivb kov Nxi, sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb ziuj lwrnb paan pia'g uaq Nxi, maaib pua kruq Eei yetg kruq xij zu'g zuaq kcvb.
23.21: kua'q zavg Eei zwavj pc'g fivj zyrug Fyenb yrub. zivb ka'Euad yaag Taaib pcvb Eei, weig zu'g aa-Taa-li-yaa huvb maag zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
23.2: ninb Bua zyrug mivb kxmj yu-Daa teig, heug yem yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb Eei le-wi myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq taaib zunq. ninb Bua zyrug taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
23.6: maiq tuvq pun haiq taub pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zwrtq liud zruj kov fub suj Eei sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb. naaiq teij pia'g tu'q Eei, weig zu'g ninb Bua Zivb Revg, mq paag zwavj pc'g fivj xij zu'g ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq Eei waag.
23.13: huvb maag mavg pwatg huvb tiaj sruq Jyenq pia'g kcvb Eei txvj, huvb Eei Dyrub ka'Len. pcvb pyeiq Zauj pyomq Ratg Eei myenb sruq Jyenq huvb Eei ka'Len. kua'q Eei zwavj pc'g fivj Fyenb yrub yaag pyomq Jxv. cvj maaib paauj Ruv Eei myenb lovg zruj Ruv Eei Jaab sig txb ninb Bua paauj Ruv Zev Tinb huvb. aa-Taa-li-yaa zyrug petq ninb Eei lwi, heug Jyenq kxvq, “peig sib aaq lo'b! peig sib aaq lo'b!”
23.12: aa-Taa-li-yaa haid pc'g fivj Tiuj yaag Zev huvb tiaj Eei Qiaj Bwi, ninb zyrug pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad Tauj pc'g fivj uaq.
23.15: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q huvb maag a'q. mivb Tauj huvb ting, pia'g maab kcvb Eei txvj, ninb Bua zyrug taij ninb taig mig a'q.
23.11: ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb txb huvb tiaj Eei txn Zwrtq taaib, yaag zx'q huvb nivq Tevj ninb Dovj Jyenq, cvj zx'q lcvd vcvg waag sru Jiu pun ninb. ye-ho-yaa-Daa Zauj ninb Eei txn Bua yaag lovg yrub xn ninb. zwavj myenb zyrug heug Jyenq kxvq, “Toq pun huvb tiaj zyavb tu'q maang fwij.”
23.1: Tauj ta'Zyetq Havj ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb zruj henq Jyenq faauj. ninb zyrug pun kunq yetg pc'q taub Eei pcvb peiq Zauj ninb lcvd waag. maaib ye-lo-ham Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, Zauj ye-ho-haa-nan Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en, Zauj o-Betg Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, Zauj aa-Daa-yaa Eei txn, maa-aa-sej-aa, Zauj sikg-li Eei txn, e-li-saa-fatq.
23.10: ninb yaag Paaiq zwavj pc'g fivj, kx'g myenb Eei puad nanq Jyenq ua'g king, peu huvb tiaj, yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Byaaug mcvj puv mivb Tauj zaaij mcvj puv, weib kxmj ziab txvb Zauj pyauq.

6.18: “Tinb huvb za'kevb xij Zauj paamb myenb yem paamb ken fai? luvb Zauj kaub Lav Jiaj Eei luvb, meib yem maiq Fiag. uaq Euvg, yia Zeij naaiq nxm pyauq meib kaub yem maiq Fiag a'q.
6.8: mq paag zyruq kxvq Buaj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, ‘meib Jiad Hruq weig yia Eei mevb lyepg nxm pyauq se lovj haig a'q, weig zu'g meib maaib naaiq Euvg za'eij yem meib Eei Hruq.
6.33: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj haid yaag ei Jyenq naaiq taub kanb fivj myenb Toq Eei waag zruj, weig pun luvb Diaq maang fivj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei mevb yaag kamb Riaj meib, Taaib meib Navq meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, kamb Riaj meib, Taaib meib nx. ninb Bua yaag haib hiuq tu'q yia Zeij naaiq nxm pyauq, myenb zyrug kan meib Eei Buaj heug.
6.3: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Zxg sruq Jyenq uaq, saa-lo-mxn huvb Win Rwrnj taaib pwav waag ninb Bua.
6.32: “kxvq Tauj kanb fivj myenb, se maiq zeid meib Eei i-saa-laa-en pc'g fivj, mq paag weig meib Lo haig Eei mevb Zauj meib Eei puad Eei tomb Qa'q yem ko Eei teib puv taaib. ninb taaib huvj Jyenq naaiq nxm pyauq tauj kauj,
6.21: meib Eei pru Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, Toq meib yem uaq luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj yia Bua Jrub Eei waag. mwavj haid liud yaag Toq kwavg yia Bua Eei zwid.
6.35: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag, pun ninb Bua tu'q hivb.
6.40: “Toq yia Eei Tinb huvb ib zang nuvj mziv mavg Jyenq yaag pcv mnxmb mwavj yem naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei waag.
6.14: ninb kxvq, “o zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, yem kub vwaaig luvb fai ka'Diaq Dau maiq maaib zyenb Navq meib nx. meib ei Jyenq meib lcvd Eei vcvg waag pun Ziv meib zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib Eei pru, tovb lovg Revg Hruq kan lovj meib uaq teij.
6.23: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj yaag ei Jyenq zruj. Toq syemq meib Eei pru Bua yaag tivg zruj txvg uaq taub Eei zwid, pun ninb ziuj ninb zruj Eei zu'g Daamb txv, cvj tivg maiq zruj txvg uaq taub maiq maaib zwid, pun ninb ziuj ninb zruj Eei tu'q lovj.
6.6: mq paag ib zang yia kinq ye-lu-saa-lem weig lyepg yia Eei mevb yem naaig nxm txvj. yia yaag kinq Daa-witq taaib kunq yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.’
6.34: “sij kxvq meib Eei pc'g fivj Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Bx'q Jaaj, maiq kunq meib Paaiq ninb Bua mivb haiq nxm txvj, ninb Bua yaag huvj Jyenq meib kinq taaib naaiq nxm zivb Zauj yia weig meib Eei mevb lyepg taaib Eei pyauq,
6.2: yia weig meib Zeij zyavj yetg nxm Rweig haig Eei pyauq, se zruj nxm txvj weig pun meib yetg liud yem.”
6.36: “meib Eei pc'g fivj haiq zang paamd zwid txvg meib, (weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub paamb myenb maiq paamd zwid), meib zyrug Qiaj Jiad ninb Bua, zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun winb wavq Zaavq ninb Bua mivb Tauj winb wavq Eei teib puv, maiq kunq ko fai fatq,
6.20: Toq meib Nxib Nxi mwrnb mwrnd mavg Jyenq naaiq nxm pyauq, se tovb meib kxvq naaiq nxm txvj, ‘yia xij lyepg yia Eei mevb yem naaiq nxm txvj.’ meib zyrug mwavj haid meib Eei pru Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei waag.
6.24: “meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, haiq zang paamd zwid txvg meib, zyrug zu'g winb wavq hivb ninb Bua, Ga'haaq ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib lxd meib, yem naaiq nxm pyauq Eyemg meib Eei Buaj, tauj kauj Jrub meib,
6.28: “sij kxvq yem naaiq nxm teib puv pwavb tomb vxg fai putq tomb wrn fai, Byaub Jiaj Buaq putq latg trud, fai Jopg Eeig faanq, fai kcvb mau faanq, fai maaib winb wavq weib kxmj xij Bx'q meib Bua Eei haiq nxm zivb, fai maiq kunq pwavb zu'g haiq Euvg ze'g naang, haiq Euvg pcvg,
6.7: “yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Jiad Hruq xij weig zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb Eei mevb, lyepg nxm pyauq.
6.29: Toq mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Eei waag. sij kxvq haiq taub myenb fai meib Eei zwavj pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Jrub meib, kx'g myenb yaag Hruq mun Tauj kx'g myenb Eei zwid, yaag suv puad huvj Jyenq naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq,
6.19: o zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq mwavj meib Eei pru txv Jyenq meib tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag. Toq mwavj meib Eei pru yem meib Eei Ra'Myen tauj kauj Toq naaiq teij waag.
6.17: o zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq meib ib zang zruj zyavj ziuj meib Zauj meib Eei pru, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag.
6.38: sij kxvq ninb Bua yem zu'g Zaavq mivb Eei teib puv pwavq Hruq pwavq eij Rwrnj taaib lxd meib, cvj huvj Jyenq meib Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv Zauj meib kinq taaib Eei zivb Zauj yia weig meib Eei mevb Zeij taaib Eei pyauq tauj kauj,
6.31: Navq naaig weig pun ninb Bua yem meib Zeij pun yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv yetg seij Taaib meib yaag kan meib Eei Jauq yavb.
6.30: Toq yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj haid yaag kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid. meib yaag hiuq tu'q myenb Eei Hruq, ziuj kx'g myenb zruj Eei Jauq Tevj ninb Bua (weig zu'g Kuvj maaib meib kanb Navq hiuq tu'q zwavj paamb myenb Eei Hruq).
6.27: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj haid zyrug kwavg meib Eei pru, se meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei zwid, yaag Faauj lovj Eei Jauq heug ninb Bua ei Jyenq zruj. Toq pun Byuvg Fiag meib pun meib Eei pc'g fivj Ripg Eei Dau.
6.11: yia liug leid zyavj txvj an lcvd vcvg waag faav. faav ka'Euad maaib tovb zyruq Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb lcvd Jiad Eei vcvg waag.”
6.5: ‘yem yia txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Zwrtq i-yipq taaib, yia maiq kinq haiq fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei haiq nxm zivb weig yia Eei mevb lyepg nxm pyauq. yia yaag maiq kinq haiq taub zruj pyeiq zeiq txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.
6.9: mq paag meib kanb maiq tu'q Zeij. se meib Eei Zyen txn xij weig yia Eei mevb Zeij nxm pyauq.’
6.16: “o zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq ib zang ei Jyenq meib Zauj meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag zruj. uaq zang meib kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Eei zeib fun faij fim, kan lovj yia Eei leib latg Navq meib kan nx, meib zyrug yetg liud maaib zeib fun zweid i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb weig.’
6.41: “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, Toq ib zang Jiad taaib maa'b! lyemb meib Zauj meib maaib Qa'q Eei uaq nxm lcvd vcvg waag faav taaib yem meib hitq Kwrnj Eei txvj. o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, Toq pun meib Eei sai myenb tu'q meib Eei Fruj en, yaag Toq pun meib Eei Zivb Revg pc'g fivj Fyenb yrub weig zu'g meib se lovj haig.
6.37: sij kxvq ninb Bua yem zu'g Zaavq mivb Eei teib puv Javj zu'g ninb Bua Eei zwid zyrug kxiq Hruq kxiq eij Rwrnj taaib lxd meib kxvq, ‘yia Bua paamd zwid, zruj waaig sig,’
6.39: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag, yaag Kxb lyenb ninb Bua. Toq kwavg meib Eei myenb Eei zwid, tovb paamd zwid txvg meib uaq teij pc'g fivj.
6.4: ninb kxvq, “Zev zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb ziuj ninb kanb Eei Rwib Zauj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag lovg ninb kanb Eei puad zruj zyavj. weig zu'g ninb kxvq,
6.10: “ib zang zyruq ei ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj. yia Ripg Jyenq yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, zweid Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb weig, Navq zyruq lcvd nx. yia yaag tu'q weig zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb Eei mevb, Zeij zyavj pyauq.
6.22: “sij kxvq maaib taub myenb zruj txvg kanb taub myenb zyrug zu'g myenb heug Druq zyruj, xij zu'g txb ninb Tauj naaiq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, pun ninb yem meib Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj Druq zyruj.
6.12: saa-lo-mxn zyrug sruq Jyenq zyruq Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj, txv Jyenq yetg zwavj kapq zunq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb suv puad tauj kauj.
6.42: o zyruq Tinb huvb, maiq tuvq Gemb meib lovg yrub xn taaib uaq taub. Toq Javj Jyenq meib lcvd zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib Eei pru, Daa-witq, uaq teij waag.”
6.15: meib ei Jyenq meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag zruj. meib kanb Eei Rwib lcvd, meib kanb Eei puad ib Nxi yaag zruj zyavj a'q.
6.13: (saa-lo-mxn lovg tovb si'q zruj yetg nxm Paavb, Daauq pyaa Dx'g, Javq pyaa Dx'g, Lav pua Dx'g. ninb zx'q Paavb an Jyenq laatg ka'Euad, Bu'Dovj Eei txvj. ninb faauj naaiq nxm Paavb txv Jyenq yetg zwavj kapq zunq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb kweig Fiag suv puad huvj Jyenq luvb.)
6.1: uaq zang saa-lo-mxn tauj kauj kxvq, “zyruq kxvq ninb xij yem Mwavj haig Eei Bwrnj ka'Euad.
6.26: “meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, haiq zang paamd zwid txvg meib, meib zyrug tivg zwid pun luvb haand, maiq twib Byuvg Fiag, sij kxvq ninb Bua Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj, Eyemg meib Eei Buaj yaag kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid,
6.25: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj haid yaag kwavg meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei zwid, txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib yem meib Zeij pun ninb Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv.

34.18: saa-faan srub piuq cvj kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “hin-Ki-yaa sai myenb pun Fung sru yia.” saa-faan zyrug yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen to'g.
34.8: yo-si-yaa zruj huvb zyepg petq Havj uaq Havj, weig fyruj Revg teib puv Zauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ninb Paaiq aa-saa-lai-yaa Eei txn, saa-faan, Zauj kunq zivb Eei tomb Jyen, maa-aa-sej-aa, Zauj yo-aa-haatg Eei txn, yo-aa srub piuq, mivb zxg zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Eei pyauq.
34.33: yo-si-yaa zx'q yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei txvj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei miub favj kwavg, yaag pun yem i-saa-laa-en ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq myenb fub suj zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb. ta'faanb yo-si-yaa Eei seij zeiq, ninb Bua kan Jyenq zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
34.3: yo-si-yaa zruj huvb kunq Yetg Havj uaq Havj, ninb Zxg lunj Eei zyavb hog, ninb Jiad kxn lxd ninb Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq, Eei Tinb huvb. ninb kunq zyepg Eeig Havj uaq Havj, ninb Jiad kxn fyruj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb myetg Revg yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj, aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj, zu'g taaib Zauj toj taaib Eei miub favj.
34.32: Ga'haaq ninb pun yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj Ben-yaa-min Eei zwavj myenb lcvd ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag. ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj ziuj Tinb huvb, se ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, Eei vcvg waag, Navq naaiq nx zruj.
34.21: “mivb Tevj yia yaag Tevj zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa myenb naaig zyruq Tauj lxd pwatg naaiq Fung sru ka'Euad Eei waag. zyruq za'kevb! Qiaj Jiad haig Bua, laaij Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq ei Jyenq zyruq Eei waag, se maiq ziuj naaiq Fung sru fiaq Eei yetg zuvq waag.”
34.14: ninb Bua zx'q tovb txb pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei Eaanb Zwrtq uaq zang, hin-Ki-yaa sai myenb lxd pwatg zyruq Eei leib latg sru, tovb Tinb huvb lovg mo-se Jiu pun Eei sru.
34.23: hun-Daa kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘xij zu'g Buaj Paaiq meib Bua taaib lxd yia uaq laanb myenb,
34.6: ninb yem maa-natq-sej, e-faa-im, si-me-on, lyemb mivb Tauj napq-Taa-li Eei nxmb nxm zivb Zauj Wiv kxmj paaig waaig Eei txvj.
34.2: ziuj zyruq mavg ninb zruj tu'q hxpg, yaag kan ninb Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq, Eei Jauq yavb, maiq Win Byaaug yaag maiq Win zaaij.
34.20: ninb zyrug Paaiq hin-Ki-yaa Zauj saa-faan Eei txn, aa-hi-Kam, Zauj mi-Kaa Eei txn, apg-Don, Zauj saa-faan srub piuq Zauj huvb tiaj Eei pru, aa-saaj-yaa,
34.24: zyruq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq. “yia xij pun naaiq nxm txvj Zauj naaiq nxm txvj Eei pc'g fivj zu'g ze'g naang, tovb txv Jyenq yu-Daa Eei huvb tiaj to'g naaiq Fung sru yetg zuvq zyruj Eei waag,
34.28: yia xij pun meib kwei seij, tu'q pcvb xn Eei zavj Jyenq meib Eei zruq. meib Eei mziv zyrug maiq pwatg yia xij pun naaiq nxm txvj Zauj naaiq nxm txvj Eei myenb zu'g Eei yetg zuvq ze'g naang.”+’+” ninb Bua zyrug txb naaiq taub msia'q txn tau Eei waag Rwrnj mivb Buaj huvb tiaj.
34.7: ninb Zc'q Revg kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei ziab txvb, Bx'q mwrng aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj, zx'q miub favj mxg penj Bwrnq yaag Va'q yetg zuvq puaq huv tiab Fiag Revg. Ga'haaq ninb Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem.
34.29: yo-si-yaa huvb zyrug heug yem yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei yetg zuvq myenb koj kapq zunq taaib.
34.19: huvb tiaj haid leib latg sru Eei waag, ninb zyrug petq ninb Eei lwi.
34.17: ninb Bua zx'q yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei Eaanb toj Zwrtq Revg Jiu pun kunq kov myenb Zauj kovb myenb.”
34.31: huvb tiaj sruq Jyenq ninb Eei txvj, txv Jyenq zyruq lyepg vcvg waag. ninb lcvd xij lovg Revg Hruq, lovg Revg za'eij ei Jyenq zyruq Eei leib latg Zauj livg Zauj leid yaag mwavj fiaq Jyenq naaiq Fung sru Eei yetg zuvq vcvg waag.
34.30: huvb tiaj Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj, lyemb sai myenb, le-wi myenb, Zauj yetg zuvq pc'g fivj, maiq kunq Lo faij, mivb Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq. ninb zyrug zx'q yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq lxd pwatg uaq Fung lcvd vcvg waag Eei sru to'g pun ninb Bua mwavj.
34.27: weig zu'g meib haid ninb kxvq naaiq nxm txvj Zauj naaiq nxm txvj Eei pc'g fivj uaq zang, meib Hruq mau, yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen zatq kanb Fiag, yaag weig zu'g meib zatq kanb Fiag petq meib Eei lwib hruj yaag txv Jyenq yia Eyemq, yia zyrug mwavj haid meib. naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
34.11: ninb Bua cvj Jiu pun Dyavb zavg Zauj komq pyauq zavg weig maaid zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeiq Zauj Dyavj zruj hcvb, zruj Dyavb laavb zxg tovb yu-Daa huvb kwavg pun ninb waaig Eei txvj.
34.5: ninb yaag zx'q uaq teij zyenb Eei sai myenb Eei Buvq an Jyenq ziab txvb puaq, zyrug fyruj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
34.9: ninb Bua zyrug mivb lxd hin-Ki-yaa tomb sai myenb zx'q zuaq kcvb Eei le-wi myenb syru taaib Eei yetg zuvq Eaanb Jiu pun ninb. naaiq teij Eaanb se yem maa-natq-sej, e-faa-im, Zauj yetg zuvq zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa, Ben-yaa-min cvj Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj syru taaib Eei Eaanb.
34.16: saa-faan zyrug txb sru mivb pun huvb tiaj. ninb cvj kxvq, “huvb tiaj Paaiq pun meib Eei pru zruj Eei kov yetg zuvq zruj Jyenq a'q.
34.4: zwavj myenb yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen Zc'q waaig Revg Baa-an zyenb Eei ziab txvb, Va'q Fiag Revg yem uaq teij ziab txvb kub vwaaig Eei puaq huv tiab. ninb Bua zx'q aa-se-laa Eei favj Zauj zu'g taaib toj taaib Eei miub favj Bx'q mwrng Revg mxg penj Bwrnq Yaamj Jyenq fovg hxg ziag pun uaq teij miub favj Eei myenb Eei zruq.
34.10: ninb Bua cvj zx'q naaiq teij Eaanb Jiu pun zxg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kunq kov myenb. naaiq teij kunq kov myenb Jiu pun zxg pyauq Eei kovb myenb zxg lovj taaib Navq lod uaq nx.
34.22: hin-Ki-yaa cvj Zauj huvb tiaj Paaiq Eei uaq teij myenb zyrug mivb lxd taub trug waag myenb msia'q txn, Buaj heug hun-Daa. hun-Daa yem ye-lu-saa-lem ta'Eeig Kav. ninb zruj hatg-laa Eei fun. Tokq-haatg Eei txn, tovb kruj huvb tiaj Eei lwib hruj uaq taub san-lum Eei auq. ninb Bua naaig naaiq taub msia'q txn Tauj naaiq teij sig.
34.12: naaiq teij myenb zyepg zua'q Eei zruj kov. kunq kov myenb maaib le-wi myenb, me-laa-li Eei zeib fun, yaa-haatg Zauj o-Baa-Di, Zauj Ko-haatq Eei zeib fun, sej-Kaa-li-yaa Zauj me-sun-laam. maaib haib lovg zruj Ruv Eei Jaab sig Eei yetg zuvq le-wi myenb.
34.15: hin-Ki-yaa kxvq Buaj saa-faan srub piuq, “yia yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad lxd pwatg leib latg sru.” ninb zyrug Jiu pun saa-faan mig a'q.
34.13: ninb Bua kunq pyenb ka'naaiq Eei kovb myenb Zauj kunq zruj Euvb Euvg kov Eei myenb. cvj maaib teij le-wi myenb zruj srub piuq Zauj Jyen Zauj zuaq kcvb myenb.
34.1: yo-si-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb tu'q Yetg Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq faab zyepg yetq Havj.
34.26: xij zu'g Buaj yu-Daa Eei huvb, tovb Paaiq meib Bua taaib naaig zyruq uaq taub, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj meib mwavj haid Eei waag.
34.25: weig zu'g ninb Bua kwavg yia, puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb. ninb Bua Eei puad zruj Eei Euvb Euvg Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad haig. weig naaiq yia Qiaj Jiad! haig naaiq nxm txvj. yia Eei ka'Qiaj zuvq maiq haib fiu.”

2.18: saa-lo-mxn Paaiq siag waang taub pyenb ka'naaiq, Yetg waang taub yem Bov zu'g la'pyeiq, pua Zin lua'g pc'q taub zruj kunq kov myenb txb myenb zruj kov.
2.3: saa-lo-mxn fuvj fyenj mivb pun Tai-la'q Eei huvb, hi-laam. ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “zinb Daavg meib fuvj sij-Daa zovb Dyavj taaib pun yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Zeij huvb ting pun ninb yem. ib zang yia Toq meib Navq naaiq nx fuvj pun yia.
2.8: “Toq meib wrng teij yem le-Baa-nxn Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, zovb Dyavj Zauj huv Dyavj taaib pun yia, weig zu'g yia hiuq tu'q meib Eei kovb myenb maaib panb zeig haib kxij le-Baa-nxn Eei Dyavj. yia Eei kovb myenb Zauj meib Eei kovb myenb mivb Jwavg Jyenq zruj,
2.9: Tevj yia lxd Dyavj Zamq Eei, weig zu'g yia xij Zeij zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Lo Lav haig, Bua'g hxvb haig.
2.7: “weig naaiq, ib zang Toq meib fuvj taub zavg myenb taaib, se maaib puab taub lovj Eei myenb, haib lovg Jyem, Eaanb, tovb si'q, Lia'q Zauj pa'ki swij si'q, lua'g, Buaq. ninb yaag xij zu'g maaib panb zeig tiu Ravg, yaag Zauj puab taub lovj Eei zavg myenb, tovb yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, liug leid zyavj Eei zavg myenb, Jwavg Jyenq zruj kov yem yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
2.5: “yia xij Zeij Eei pyauq xij zu'g za'kevb Lo haig, weig zu'g yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb se kaub Lo Jiaj yetg zuvq zyenb.
2.16: yia Bua zyrug yem le-Baa-nxn Bov kxij ziuj meib Qyemj zu'g lovg Eei Dyavj, cvj kitq penj Baib, kan Kxiq fuvj Fiag Tauj yapq-faa. meib Bua zyrug yem naaig fuvj mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.”
2.17: saa-lo-mxn faauj myenb hrud saauq Revg yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb, Navq zinb Daavg ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, faauj myenb hrud nx. pwatg maaib yetg sinj pyaa waang pua Zin lua'g pc'q taub kanb fivj myenb.
2.14: ninb Eei maa se Daan fivj Eei myenb. ninb Eei tia se Tai-la'q myenb. ninb haib lovg Jyem, Eaanb, tovb si'q, Lia'q, la'pyeiq Zauj Dyavj, yaag haib lovg Buaq, lua'g Zauj si'q Eei pa'ki swij yaag haib Datq la'maab Diab mwrng. ninb haib tiu Euvb Euvg pyavb pyruq yaag ziuj myenb heug ninb zruj Eei Euvb Euvg favj ninb haib zruj tu'q Zwrtq Eei. ninb Zauj Jyenq meib Eei zavg myenb Zauj yia Eei zyruq, Daa-witq, Eei zavg myenb, haib Jwavg Jyenq zruj.
2.4: yia xij Jiad kxn weig zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb Eei mevb, Zeij nxm pyauq penj Ziv Revg Eei txvj fuvj pun ninb, yaag yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen fovg hxg puaq huv, zanb zang kevj Fuaq, se Dxmb Dxm mwrnb mwrnd Zauj tivb kov Nxi Zauj syavb Laaj, cvj weig zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, tivg taaib Eei zipq fovg hxg puaq ziag. naaiq se weig i-saa-laa-en myenb tivg taaib yetg liud lovg Eei leid.
2.2: ninb kinq Zwrtq siag waang taub myenb pyenb ka'naaiq Zauj Yetg waang taub yem Bovb aiq txvj zu'g la'pyeiq. cvj maaib pua Zin lua'g pc'q taub zruj kunq kov myenb kunq ninb Bua.
2.6: mq paag haiq taub haib weig ninb Zeij naaiq nxm pyauq? weig zu'g luvb, lyemb Lav Jiaj Eei luvb, ninb yem maiq Fiag. uaq Euvg yia penj haiq taub Zivj xij Zeij nxm pyauq pun ninb, Zwrtq liud Zeij taaib weig yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen puaq huv?
2.13: “ib zang yia Paaiq taub puab taub Lav, maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb, Buaj heug hu-laam-aa-Bi.
2.12: hi-laam cvj Jaa waag kxvq, “xij zu'g Zev zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, tovb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq taub. ninb Zeij pun Daa-witq huvb tu'q taub Zovb mevb Eei txn, maaib wrnb zaav yaag haib Namq tu'q Tov Eei. ninb xij weig zyruq Zeij nxm pyauq cvj weig ninb kanb Zeij nxm huvb ting.
2.15: “tovb yia Eei zyruq lcvd uaq teij Byaub witq, Byaub Baa-li, ka'lanq yrub Zauj a'vung tiuq, Toq fuvj taaib pun yia Eei kovb myenb.
2.11: Tai-la'q Eei huvb, hi-laam fiaq fyenj wib saa-lo-mxn. ninb kxvq, “weig zu'g zyruq Namq ninb Eei pc'g fivj, ninb lyepg meib zruj ninb Bua Eei huvb.”
2.1: saa-lo-mxn tivg Hruq xij weig zyruq Eei mevb Zeij nxm pyauq yaag xij weig ninb kanb Zeij nxm huvb ting.
2.10: weig meib Eei kovb myenb yia xij pun i sinj i waang Tovq Bx'q zyavj Eei Byaub, Zauj i sinj i waang Tovq Byaub Baa-li, Zauj i waang i Zin Tovq ka'lanq yrub, Zauj i waang i Zin Tovq a'vung tiuq.”

36.18: ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa yaag txb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Jaab txvj, maiq kunq Lo faij, Zauj yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zauj huvb tiaj Zauj huvb tiaj Eei Jyen yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq.
36.8: ye-ho-yaa-Kim kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj liud zevg Fiag Eei sig, Zauj ninb zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig Zauj yetg zuvq maiq penj Eei Jauq, fiaq Jyenq yem i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb trub taan. ninb Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kin, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
36.3: i-yipq Eei huvb Twij ninb Fiag ninb Eei weig cvj paatg yu-Daa Zwrtq i Zin yetg pc'q Zauj pyaa Jxib  Eaanb Zauj Eig zyepg yetq Jxib  Jyem.
36.21: teib puv zyrug penj Daub Waav Zyetq zyepg Havj, zuaq Dau hitq Kwrnj Eei Havj pwavq. Navq naaig se weig zruj zyavj ziuj zyruq lovg ye-le-mi kxvq Eei waag.
36.14: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. zwavj sai myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq Zauj pc'g fivj fib Navq Eei maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj yetg teij. ninb Bua kan Jyenq kanb fivj myenb zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig, pun tovb zyruq yem ye-lu-saa-lem saaj Zivb Revg Eei pyauq maaib wij.
36.23: “pe-sia Eei huvb, sai-latq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq. “+‘ zyruq, luvb zavg Eei Tinb huvb, zx'q luvb Diaq maang kua'q Jiu pun yia yaag Paaiq yia yem yu-Daa Eei ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Zeij nxm pyauq pun ninb. yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj maaib haiq taub zruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, Toq zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj ninb yem. kunq pun ninb faauj mivb a'q.’+”
36.6: Baa-Bi-lon Eei ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa huvb taaib Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj, zx'q tovb si'q limg Dob Jyenq weig txb ninb mivb Baa-Bi-lon.
36.2: yo-aa-haatg faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q Eig zyepg faam Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq pua Laaj Eia'g.
36.20: tovb pyauj Dutq maiq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij uaq teij, ninb kwaatq mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon. ninb Bua zyrug penj ninb Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun Eei nrub Tauj lyepg Jiad pe-sia kua'q.
36.7: ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa yaag zx'q teij zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad Eei Jaab sig txb mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon, an Jyenq ninb Eei miub pyauq.
36.19: ninb Bua puaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, Zc'q waaig ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb laatg, lovg trud puaq zivb ka'Euad Eei nxmb nxm huvb ting, cvj paaig waaig yem uaq Eei yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq.
36.17: weig naaiq Tinb huvb pun Baa-Bi-lon myenb  taaib Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj, se yem sivj ting lovg Ru'g Daauq taij ninb Bua Eei hrub scv yaag maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua Eei myenb lunj myenb, maiq kunq mJavg msia'q fai myenb koj myenb fai putg pcvg myenb. Tinb huvb zx'q ninb Bua yetg zuvq Jiu pun yem ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa Eei puab Diaq.
36.11: sej-De-Ki-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb tu'q Eig zyepg yetq Havj.
36.5: ye-ho-yaa-Kim faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q Eig zyepg Mmd Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq zyepg yetq Havj. ziuj zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig.
36.9: ye-ho-yaa-Kin faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q zyepg petq Havj  ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq pua Laaj Zauj zyepg Nxi. ziuj zyruq mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig.
36.16: ninb Bua Jyetq ninb Eei trug fyenj myenb, mavg Piaj ninb Eei waag, yaag Wrtq ninb Eei trug waag myenb Tauj zyruq Qiaj Jiad! haig, nrud ninb Eei pc'g fivj. ninb Bua zuvq maiq haib pyauj maiq Dutq a'q.
36.4: i-yipq Eei huvb, ne-Ko, lyepg yo-aa-haatg Eei kxj, e-li-yaa-Kim, zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem cvj Tiuq ninb Eei Buaj heug ye-ho-yaa-Kim. mq paag ne-Ko zx'q ye-ho-yaa-Kim Eei yrud, yo-aa-haatg, txb mivb Tauj i-yipq teib puv.
36.10: Tauj Zun kweij Nxi, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa huvb Paaiq myenb mivb txb ye-ho-yaa-Kin Zauj yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Euvb Euvg Jaaij Eei Jaab txvj, mivb Baa-Bi-lon. ninb yaag lyepg ye-ho-yaa-Kin Eei yrub tiaj, sej-De-Ki-yaa, zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
36.22: pe-sia huvb, sai-latq, zruj huvb taaub Havj uaq Havj, weig pun zyruq lovg ye-le-mi kxvq Eei waag Zwrtq taaib txib tiug, zyruq tovd zu'g pe-sia Eei sai-latq huvb. ninb zyrug zunb waag kxmj ninb Eei kua'q yaag fiaq Fiag kxvq,
36.12: ziuj zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, mavg, ninb zruj waaig sig. trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, txb zyruq Eei waag Kwinj ninb mq paag ninb maiq yem ye-le-mi Eei Ra'Myen zatq kanb Fiag.
36.15: zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, maiq tivb lyrub Eei Paaiq ninb Eei trug fyenj myenb mivb weig zu'g ninb Kxb lyenb ninb Eei pc'g fivj Zauj ninb yem Eei txvj.
36.13: ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa aapq ninb zyavq Jyenq Tinb huvb hruq waag, mq paag ninb Zxg vcvg ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa. ninb Eei Hruq vcvg, maiq kxiq Hruq Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb.
36.1: yu-Daa myenb lyepg yo-aa-haatg Ripg Jyenq ninb Eei tia zruj huvb yem ye-lu-saa-lem.

20.18: ye-ho-saa-fatq zyrug Do'q mGxvq Fiag, Myen Pua'q Fiag Tauj Dau. yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj yaag yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Pua'q Tauj Dau Zauj Jyenq paaij zyruq.
20.8: ninb Bua yem naaiq nxm txvj yaag weig meib Eei mevb Zeij nxm sivj ting. ninb Bua kxvq,
20.33: mq paag yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj maiq tu'q Zc'q kwavg. pc'g fivj maiq kcvb lyepg tivg Hruq kan ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
20.3: ye-ho-saa-fatq kamb Riaj haig zyrug tivg Hruq lxd zyruq yaag zunb Buaj kxmj yu-Daa teig Eei myenb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg.
20.32: ye-ho-saa-fatq ei Jyenq ninb Eei tia, aa-saaj, zruj Eei Jauq, maiq Pyen yetg teij. ziuj zyruq mavg ninb zruj tu'q hxpg.
20.21: huvb tiaj Zauj pc'g fivj Zaavb laavb liud, ninb Paaiq paauj Ruv myenb paauj Ruv. Zev zyruq uaq teij zu'q Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei lwib hruj. Zwrtq mivb Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua yem Junb pcv Eei Ra'Myen mcvj paauj Jyenq kxvq, “lcvd zivb zyruq, weig zu'g ninb yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb.”
20.35: Ga'haaq yu-Daa huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq, Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hatg-yaa, kapq txig. aa-hatg-yaa yaag zruj x'q Eei sig Zamq haig.
20.14: yaa-haa-si-en sruq Jyenq kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj uaq zang, zyruq Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib yem ninb. yaa-haa-si-en se sej-Kaa-li-yaa Eei txn, sej-Kaa-li-yaa se Be-nai-yaa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa se ye-i-en Eei txn, ye-i-en se matq-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, se le-wi myenb, aa-saapg, Eei zeib fun.
20.23: weig zu'g am-mon Zauj mo-apg myenb kcv Jyenq taij e-Dom myenb Tauj taij zutg Revg. Ga'haaq ninb Bua meib taij yia, yia taij meib, zyrug zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q.
20.6: ninb kxvq, “o zyruq, yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb aa'b! meib se yem luvb zavg Eei Tinb huvb maiq zeid? meib kunq luvb Diaq Eei maang fivj Eei maang kua'q. meib Eei puad maaib Qa'q henq, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub haib hivb Jiaj meib.
20.34: ye-ho-saa-fatq kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig, yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, fiaq Jyenq haa-naa-ni Eei txn, ye-hu, Eei srub taan, se Jwavg i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb trub taan.
20.2: maaib myenb taaib Buaj ye-ho-saa-fatq huvb, “maaib tomb kwanb Junb pcv yem e-Dom Zauj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib taig taaib xij Zauj huvb tiaj Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua zuvq yem Jyenq haa-saa-son-Taa-maa, (cvj maaib kanb nxm Buaj heug en-ke-Di).
20.36: ninb Bua i taub Jwavg Jyenq kapq Ravq mivb Taan-sitq. naaiq teij Ravq yem e-si-on-ke-Be kapq taaib.
20.20: ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei pc'g fivj Zwrtq Jauq mivb Te-Ko-aa teib puvb Waav. Zwrtq Jauq Eei zyavb hog ye-ho-saa-fatq sruq Jyenq kxvq, “yu-Daa myenb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b! xij zu'g syenj Kauj zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, meib Bua zyrug yem tu'q wrnq. xij zu'g syenj ninb Eei trug waag myenb trug Eei waag, meib Bua zyrug haib zruj tu'q zyavj.
20.24: yu-Daa myenb mivb Tauj teib puvb Waav Eei laaub mavg Fiag tomb Junb pcv kwanb uaq, Kuvj pwatg Janb taig pweij Jyenq Daub peib Navq. maiq maaib yetg taub tu'q Zwrtq sivj mcvg.
20.28: ninb Bua Patq tomb taanb paab, fiub taanb paab, pyomq Ratg Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
20.7: yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aag, meib maiq zeid yem meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung naaiq nxm teib puv Eei myenb Zwrtq, cvj zx'q teib puv Jiu pun meib Eei lob kcv txig, apg-laa-ham, Eei zeib fun Ripg fai?
20.29: nxmb nxm kua'q Eei huvb haid zyruq Navq naaiq nx Bx'q hivb i-saa-laa-en Eei winb wavq, ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig Tinb huvb.
20.19: le-wi fivj Eei Ko-haatq myenb Zauj Ko-laa myenb sruq Jiad taaib lovg Qiaj Lo Eei Zev zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb.
20.17: yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb aa'b! naaiq Rung meib Bua maiq zu'g Bx'q Jaaj. Kuvj xij zu'g sruq Baib Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei txvj tivg Eei, mavg Jyenq zyruq weig meib Bua hivb. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj yaag maiq tuvq Hruq mau. Fav Nxi Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj, zyruq yaag Zauj meib Bua yem.”
20.31: Navq naaiq nx, ye-ho-saa-fatq zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb. faauj weig kunq Eei zyavb hog ninb tu'q faab zyepg Mmd Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Eei zyavb hog zyepg Mmd Havj. ninb Eei maa se sin-hi Eei sia'q, Buaj heug aa-su-Baa.
20.30: Navq naaig ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei kua'q Taaib pcvb, weig zu'g ninb Eei Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei pyei puv pcvb xn.
20.27: Ga'haaq yem yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei taub taub myenb Rwrnj a'q. ye-ho-saa-fatq txb ninb Bua Fyenb Fyen yrub yrub Eei Rwrnj, weig zu'g zyruq Tevj ninb Bua Bx'q hivb winb wavq zyrug xnb lx'g haig.
20.11: mavg maa'b! ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx winb pun yia Bua. ninb Bua xij zung yia Bua Zwrtq meib Eei pwrng teib puv, tovb meib Zeij pun yia Bua Ripg Eei teib puv.
20.5: ye-ho-saa-fatq yem yu-Daa myenb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb kapq zunq Eei txvj sruq Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, laatg ka'Euad Eei syavb txvj Ra'Myen mcvj.
20.9: ‘sij kxvq maaib ze'g naang hxig yia Bua, maiq kunq Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig fai tomb wrnb pcvg fai tomb Waav tomb vxg, yia Bua yem Kruq Eei zyavb hog sruq Jyenq naaiq nxm pyauq Ra'Myen txv Jyenq meib heug, weig zu'g meib Eei mevb yem naaiq nxm pyauq ka'Euad, meib zuvq xij mwavj haid yaag Fruj yia Bua.’
20.16: Fav Nxi Fiag mivb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua xij yavb sitg Eei zxv faauj. meib Bua zyrug pwavb ninb Bua yem ye-lu-en teib puvb Waav Eei hxvb Kuq.
20.37: txij uaq zang, maa-le-saa myenb, Do-Daa-waa-hu Eei txn, e-li-e-se, trug waag Buaj ye-ho-saa-fatq, “weig zu'g meib Zauj aa-hatg-yaa kapq txig, zyruq xij zruj waaig meib zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq.” uaq teij Ravq zyrug za'kevb Baaij Revg, maiq haib mivb Taan-sitq.
20.4: yu-Daa myenb kapq zunq taaib Toq zyruq Tevj. ninb Bua zuvq yem yu-Daa teig Eei nxmb nxm zivb taaib lxd zyruq.
20.10: “mavg maa'b! ib zang am-mon myenb, mo-apg myenb Zauj e-Dom myenb taaib Bx'q yia Bua. zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv taaib Eei zyavb hog, meib maiq pun ninb Bua pia'g naaiq teij myenb Eei teig. yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij zyrug wivg Jiaj, maiq myetg ninb Bua.
20.22: ninb Bua Jiad kxn paauj Ruv Zev Eei zyavb hog, zyruq pun pcv zuaq Jyenq Bx'q tovb taaib Zauj yu-Daa myenb Bx'q Jaaj uaq teij am-mon myenb, mo-apg myenb Zauj e-Dom myenb. ninb Bua zyrug zu'g Bx'q swei Revg.
20.12: o yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aag, meib maiq tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid fai? weig zu'g yia Bua maiq maaib Qa'q Bx'q tovb taaib Bx'q yia Bua uaq teij tomb! kwanb Junb pcv. yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx zruj mq paag yia Bua Eei mziv mavg Jyenq meib.”
20.15: yaa-haa-si-en kxvq, “ye-ho-saa-fatq huvb Zauj yem yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj aag, meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj. zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj meib Bua, ‘maiq tuvq laaij naaiq tomb kwanb Junb pcv kamb Riaj, yaag maiq tuvq Hruq mau, weig zu'g Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jauq penj Tinb huvb Eei, maiq zeid meib Bua Eei.
20.13: yu-Daa myenb Eei yetg zuvq mJavg txn Zauj ninb Bua Eei auq, ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad Zauj fu'Jweiq kapq zunq sruq Jyenq zyruq Eei Ra'Myen.
20.1: Ga'haaq mo-apg myenb Zauj am-mon myenb, cvj maaib teij me-u-ni myenb taaib Zauj ye-ho-saa-fatq Bx'q Jaaj.
20.26: Tauj ta'feij Nxi ninb Bua yetg zuvq yem Be-laa-Kaa hxvd, yem uaq Zev zyruq. weig naaiq ninb Bua Zivj Zwrtq Buaj heug Be-laa-Kaa hxvd Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
20.25: ye-ho-saa-fatq Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj mivb Raud Janb taig Eei ka'naaiq uaq zang, ninb Bua pwatg scvb Kuq Zamq Eei, yaag maaib ziaj Euvg ka'naaiq Zauj lwib hruj Zauj Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua weig kanb Raud taaib Tauj zuvq pyenb maiq hivb. ninb Bua Raud Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq pwavq pua Nxi weig zu'g za'kevb Zamq haig.

24.18: ninb Bua zyrug kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, zavg aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj Zauj kanb Euvg miub favj. laaij ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx paamd zwid, yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad, nrud ninb Bua.
24.8: huvb tiaj zyrug Fiag livg. ninb Bua zyrug zruj nxm faav an Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Eiag mcvj, nitq laatg kcvb.
24.3: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Tevj ninb lxd i taub auq. ninb yaag tu'q txn tu'q sia'q Eei.
24.21: mq paag ninb Bua Zaavb laavb taaq za'eij hxig sej-Kaa-li-yaa. zwavj myenb zyrug ziuj huvb tiaj Paaiq Eei waag yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, laatg ka'Euad, lovg la'pyeiq zov taig ninb.
24.14: zruj zyavj Revg, ninb Bua txb zevg Eei Eaanb mivb Tauj huvb tiaj Zauj ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei Ra'Myen. ninb Bua lovg naaiq teij Eaanb zruj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei Jaab txvj weig fub suj Zauj fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei Jauq. ninb Bua zruj Rxmg yenq Zauj lovg Jyem lovg Eaanb Eei Jaab sig. ta'faanb ye-ho-yaa-Daa Zxg yem seij zavg Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zanb zang yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq fovg hxg puaq ziag.
24.23: Tauj Havb tweiq, si-lia myenb Eei Junb pcv taaib Bx'q yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem yaag taij Revg pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq. Zaavq taaib Eei yetg zuvq zinb zxib ninb Bua fuvj mivb Tauj Daa-matq-katg zivb Eei huvb uaq.
24.6: huvb tiaj zyrug heug ye-ho-yaa-Daa tomb sai myenb taaib, kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib weig haiq tiug maiq heug le-wi myenb Zwrtq mivb syru yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei myenb Havb Havj Zwrtq Eei Rrub zinb? naaiq se zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Zauj kapq zunq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb tivg xij zu'g Zwrtq weig zxg lcvd vcvg waag Eei Dopg liub.”
24.2: ta'faanb ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb zyavb Jyenq Eei zyavb hog, ziuj zyruq mavg, yo-aatg zruj tu'q hxpg.
24.20: zruj kau, Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib yem ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb Eei txn, sej-Kaa-li-yaa. ninb zyrug sruq Jyenq pc'g fivj Eei Ra'Myen kxvq, “Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib Bua weig haiq tiug paamd zyruq Eei leib latg? weig naaiq meib Bua maiq haib tu'q lovj. laaij meib Bua kwavg zyruq, ninb yaag kwavg meib Bua a'q.
24.24: maiq kunq si-lia Eei Junb pcv kwanb zo'g Eei, zyruq zx'q yu-Daa Eei tomb Junb pcv kwanb Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq. laaij yu-Daa myenb kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, yo-aatg zu'g tivg zwid.
24.7: uaq taub waaig haig Eei msia'q txn, aa-Taa-li-yaa, Eei txn Bua pxvd pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq cvj zx'q fuvj pun zyruq Eei Zivb Revg ka'naaiq lovg weig Baa-an zyenb.
24.19: mq paag Tinb huvb Paaiq trug waag myenb taaib yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj, xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq. trug waag myenb zruj zxvb zevj kxvq ninb Bua txvg Eei txvj, mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj.
24.17: ye-ho-yaa-Daa kwei seij liud, yu-Daa Eei Jyen taaib paaij huvb tiaj. huvb tiaj yaag mwavj ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag.
24.27: yo-aatg Eei txn Bua Eei Jaub lrug, kxvq ninb uaq teij zinb hod Eei waag Zamq, Zauj zxg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Jauq fiaq Jyenq Pxq huvb trub taan Eei sru. ninb Eei txn, aa-maa-si-yaa, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
24.11: le-wi myenb haiq zang txb uaq nxm faav mivb huvb tiaj Eei Jyen uaq, ninb Bua pwatg maaib Eaanb Zamq nx, huvb tiaj Eei srub piuq Zauj tomb sai myenb Eei Jyen zyrug taaib toj Eaanb Zwrtq cvj txb faav taaib an lob txvj. ninb Bua Nxi Jiaj Nxi Navq naaiq nx zruj, zyrug syru tu'q Eaanb Zamq.
24.5: ninb heug sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb kapq zunq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g mivb Tauj yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb syru i-saa-laa-en zwavj myenb Eei Rrub zinb weig Havb Havj lovg zxg meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. meib Bua yaag xij zu'g syepg syepq Eei Beng naaiq teij sig.” mq paag le-wi myenb maiq kaanq zruj.
24.9: maaib fyenj zunb kxmj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem, Buaj myenb Zwrtq Rrub zinb ziuj Tinb huvb Eei pru, mo-se, yem teib puvb Waav Paaiq i-saa-laa-en myenb fuvj Eaanb taaib pun zyruq.
24.16: ninb Bua zavj ninb yem Daa-witq Eei zivb, zwavj huvb Eei Bu'Dovj, weig zu'g ninb yem i-saa-laa-en zruj Kuq sig, yaag weig Tinb huvb Zauj Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zruj lovj.
24.4: Ga'haaq yo-aatg tivg Hruq zxg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
24.10: zwavj pyeiq zeiq Zauj yetg zuvq pc'g fivj Fyenb yrub haig. ninb Bua txb ninb Bua Eei Rrub zinb taaib tapq uaq nxm faav Tauj Zwrtq Rxib Revg.
24.22: Navq naaig, yo-aatg huvb maiq Javj sej-Kaa-li-yaa Eei tia, ye-ho-yaa-Daa, zinb Daavg Tevj ninb Eei enb zivb. ninb zuvq zx'q ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn taij. xij taig uaq zang, sej-Kaa-li-yaa kxvq, “Toq zyruq mavg cvj Tevj Jaauq win.”
24.12: huvb tiaj Zauj ye-ho-yaa-Daa zx'q naaiq teij Eaanb taaib Jiu pun zxg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kunq kov myenb. ninb Bua Zivq la'pyeib zavg Zauj Dyavb zavg weig zxg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, yaag Zivq Lia'g zavg Zauj tovb zavg taaib zxg zyruq Eei pyauq.
24.15: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei Havb Jeiq Lav, koj haig a'q. ninb kwei seij Eei zyavb hog ninb tu'q yetg pc'q faab zyepg Havj.
24.13: kovb myenb Jyenb zruj kov zyrug zxg lovj Jyenq faauj. ninb Bua zxg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Navq lod uaq nx, yaag zruj wrnq Navq zinb Daavg nx.
24.1: yo-aatg faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q siag Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq feij zyepg Havj. ninb Eei maa, Buaj heug si-Bi-yaa, se Be-e-Qe-Baa zivb Eei myenb.
24.26: taaq za'eij hxig huvb tiaj uaq teij se am-mon myenb msia'q txn, si-me-atg Eei txn, saaj-Baatg, Zauj mo-apg myenb msia'q txn, sim-litq Eei txn, ye-ho-saa-Baatg.
24.25: si-lia Eei pcv Twij yo-aatg Eei zyavb hog, ninb zu'g mun syav Eei. ninb Eei Jyen taaq za'eij hxig ninb weig zu'g ninb taij ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb Eei txn. ninb pweij Jyenq Zruj Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zyrug taij ninb a'q. ninb zyrug taig mig a'q, zavj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei zivb, mq paag maiq zavj yem huvb Eei zrub kemb.

28.18: fi-li-saa-tia myenb yaag Zaavq pia'g yu-Daa Bovb aiq txvj Zauj ne-kepg. ninb Bua Zaavq tu'q cvj yem Jyenq Betg-se-metq, ai-yaa-lon, ke-De-lotq, soj-Ko Zauj weib kxmj Eei laavd, Tim-naa-haa Zauj weib kxmj Eei laavd Zauj kim-so Zauj weib kxmj Eei laavd.
28.8: i-saa-laa-en myenb kwaatq ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud, msia'q txn Zauj naamb Erud mivb. yetg zuvq maaib i sinj taub. ninb Bua yaag Zaavq tu'q ka'naaiq Zamq haig, txb Jyenq Rwrnj saa-maa-lia.
28.3: ninb yem Ben-hin-nom hxvd puaq huv yaag zx'q ninb Eei txn Bua lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg, zwrtg Jyenq zyruq zung Zwrtq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj uaq teij fivb fivj myenb zruj kamb Riaq haig Eei sig.
28.21: aa-hatg zx'q yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei zinb zxib Zauj huvb ting Eei zinb zxib Zauj zruj pc'g fivj Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq Eei zinb zxib fuvj pun atg-si-lia Eei huvb, mq paag Tevj maiq zu'g ninb kanb.
28.14: pcv zyrug zx'q kwaatq taaib Eei myenb Zauj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq kwavg Jyenq pyeiq zeiq Zauj kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen.
28.23: ninb txb ka'naaiq fovg hog ziag pun Daa-matq-katg Eei zyenb, tovb pun ninb zu'g swei uaq teij. ninb yaag kxvq, “weig zu'g si-lia Eei huvb Eei zyenb Tevj ninb Bua, yia zyrug fovg hxg ziag pun naaiq teij zyenb, ninb Bua zyrug Tevj yia.” mq paag naaiq teij zyenb pun ninb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zu'g myetg.
28.6: Du'g Nxi Navq le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn, pe-Kaa, taij yu-Daa myenb Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv yetg sinj i waang taub laaij ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
28.2: ninb ei Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb zruj. ninb yaag toj miub favj weig paaij Baa-an zyenb.
28.20: atg-si-lia Eei huvb, Tikq-latq-pi-le-sej, taaib Bx'q ninb, zuvq hxig maiq zeid Tevj ninb maaib Qa'q.
28.24: aa-hatg zx'q zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei yetg zuvq Jaab txvj Bx'q huq zruj ziaj Levj. ninb kwrn Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kcvb, yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei nxmb nxm kx'q weig kanb Zeij ziab txvb.
28.7: maaib taub e-faa-im myenb Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv, Buaj heug sikg-li, taij huvb tiaj Eei txn, maa-aa-sej-aa, Zauj kruj huvb ting Eei tomb Jyen, atg-li-Kam, Zauj yem huvb tiaj ka'Diaq mcvj Lo Jiaj uaq taub en-Kaa-naa.
28.19: zyruq zatq yu-Daa Fiag, laaij i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hatg, weig zu'g ninb yem yu-Daa Zo'q myenb zruj waaig sig yaag maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun zyruq.
