28.17: weig zu'g e-Dom myenb cvj taaib Bx'q yu-Daa yaag kwaatq myenb mivb.
28.27: aa-hatg kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. mq paag ninb maiq tu'q yem i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Eei zrub kemb. ninb Eei txn, he-se-Ki-yaa, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
28.11: ib zang meib Bua mwavj yia kxvq maa'b! xij zu'g zx'q meib Bua kwaatq taaib Jwavg fivj Eei kxb yrud fuvj Rwrnj weig zu'g zyruq Qiaj Jiad! haig meib Bua.
28.5: weig naaiq zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, zx'q ninb Jiu pun si-lia Eei huvb. si-lia Eei huvb Bx'q hivb ninb yaag Zaavq ninb Eei pc'g fivj Zamq Eei txb mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb. Tinb huvb yaag zx'q ninb Jiu pun i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb. i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb pun ninb Bua zu'g taij taig Zamq.
28.9: mq paag yem uaq maaib zyruq Eei yetg taub trug waag myenb, Buaj heug o-Detg. Junb pcv kwanb Rwrnj Tauj saa-maa-lia ninb Zwrtq mivb zipq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “weig zu'g zyruq, meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, Qiaj Jiad yu-Daa, ninb zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. meib Bua Qiaj Jiad Jyenq taij Eei Qiaj faauj Tauj luvb mig a'q.
28.16: uaq zang aa-hatg huvb fuvj myenb mivb lxd atg-si-lia Eei huvb Toq ninb Tevj,
28.4: ninb yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj Zauj Bovb aiq txvj, cvj yem tiub tiub Dyavb faanj fovg hxg puaq ziag yaag puaq huv.
28.10: ib zang meib Bua maaib Hruq aapq Zauj meib Bua Jwavg fivj Eei myenb zruj meib Bua Eei nrub kauq nrub peid. mq paag meib Bua kanb maiq paamd zwid txvg zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb fai?
28.22: naaiq taub aa-hatg pwavb zu'g Kruq naang Eei zyavb hog, ninb kaub fatq maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun zyruq.
28.12: maaib teij e-faa-im Eei pyeiq zeiq, se ye-ho-haa-nan Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, Zauj me-sin-le-motq Eei txn, Be-le-Ki-yaa, Zauj san-lum Eei txn, ye-hitq-Ki-yaa, Zauj hatg-lai Eei txn, aa-maa-saaj, sruq Jiad taaib vcvg Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Rwrnj taaib Eei zwavj myenb.
28.15: tovb te'q Jyenq Buaj heug uaq teij myenb zyrug txb kwaatq taaib Eei myenb. yem uaq teij Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua zx'q teij lwib hruj pun lcvb kcvq Eei uaq teij zu'q. ninb Bua pun lwib hruj, heb, Eang hopq Zauj Raatq ka'naaib mun Eei yrub. mau Eei uaq teij ninb Bua pun keb Jyenq lxb fuvj Tauj ninb Bua kanb Eei kxb yrud yem ye-li-Ko, se taau Dyavj Eei zivb. Ga'haaq ninb Bua kanb Rwrnj saa-maa-lia mig a'q.
28.13: ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Bua maiq tuvq txb Zaavq taaib naaiq teij myenb pia'g naaiq. maiq zei c'q, meib Bua zruj txvg zyruq. yia Bua zuvq maaib zwid mig a'q. meib Bua cvj Jaa pun yia Bua Daam kaub Niaq. Bua maaib zwid Lo haig a'q. ninb zuvq nrud haig i-saa-laa-en myenb mig a'q.”
28.1: aa-hatg faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb tu'q Eig zyepg Havj. ninb yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq zyepg lua'g Havj. ninb maiq Navq ninb Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq, nx. ziuj zyruq mavg, aa-hatg zruj maiq hxpg.
28.26: aa-hatg zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Jauq, yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, fiaq Jyenq yu-Daa Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb trub taan.
28.25: yem yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb ninb Zeij yem Lav Eei txvj weig puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb, zyrug Zua'q zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Qiaj Jiad haig.

7.18: yia zyrug lyepg wrnq meib Eei huvb weig Navq yia lcvd pun meib Eei tia, Daa-witq nx. uaq zang yia kxvq, ‘meib Eei zeib fun yetg liud maiq tavj myenb zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en.’
7.8: uaq zang saa-lo-mxn Jiaj uaq nxm zipq siag Nxi, ninb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kapq zunq penj nxm tomb! wig. se yem le-Bo-haa-matq mivb Tauj i-yipq Do'q.
7.3: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb pwatg trud yem luvb Fiag taaib, yaag pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem sivj ting kub vwaaig uaq zang, ninb Bua Baapq Fiag Myen Tauj timg Jyenq la'pyeiq Eei Dau paaij, lcvd zivb zyruq, kxvq, “zyruq se lovj haig, weig zu'g ninb yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb.”
7.21: tovb ib zang myenb Taaib naaiq nxm pyauq, Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb zyrug xij Bua'g hxvb haig, Jyetq Jyenq kxvq, ‘zyruq weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx zruj pun naaiq nxm teib puv Zauj naaiq nxm pyauq?’
7.14: sij kxvq yia Eei myenb, tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug uaq teij pc'g fivj, Eyemg kanb zruj faij, tauj kauj lxd yia, yaag kwavg ninb Bua zruj Eei waaig sig, yia zyrug yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj haid yaag kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid, cvj zxg ninb Bua Eei teib puv lovj.
7.6: sai myenb sruq Jyenq kx'g myenb yem Eei txvj. le-wi myenb Zauj Jyenq lovg zruj Ruv Eei Jaab sig Zev zyruq, se Daa-witq huvb zruj taaib lovg lcvd zivb zyruq weig zyruq yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb. sai myenb Win mivb le-wi myenb uaq puv pyomq Ratg. i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb sruq Jyenq uaq.
7.2: sai myenb maiq haib pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, weig zu'g zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem pwavq zyruq Eei pyauq.
7.20: yia zyrug pcv i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq, maiq pun yem yia Jiu pun ninb Bua uaq nxm teib puv. lyemb weib yia Eei mevb yia pun Zivb Revg naaiq nxm pyauq, yia yaag kwavg maiq mavg. yia yaag xij pun naaiq nxm pyauq yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj zu'g myenb zruj kruq kxvq yaag Jyetq.
7.7: saa-lo-mxn saaj yem laatg ka'Euad, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj Eei txvj, Zivb Revg taaib. yem naaig ninb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei scvb Kuq Mei, weig zu'g saa-lo-mxn zruj uaq nxm tovb si'q ziab txvb an maiq Fiag puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g Zauj Mei.
7.19: “mq paag sij kxvq meib kwavg, maiq kan yia yaag maiq ei yia Jiu pun meib Bua Eei livg Zauj leib latg, zyrug mivb fub suj zavg Eiag Eei zyenb nx,
7.17: “meib kanb c'q, sij kxvq meib zyepg zua'q Eei kan lovj yia Navq meib Eei tia, Daa-witq, nx, meib yaag ei Revg yia Paaiq Eei yetg zuvq waag, yaag kan lovj yia Eei livg Zauj leib latg,
7.11: saa-lo-mxn zruj zyavj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zauj ninb kanb Eei huvb ting, yaag yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ziuj ninb maaib Hruq zruj Eei zruj zyavj Revg.
7.5: saa-lo-mxn huvb lovg i waang i Zin taub vovb Zauj yetg sinj i waang taub pa'ki yuvb fovg hxg ziag. huvb tiaj Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj zyrug Navq naaiq nx zx'q Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fuvj pun ninb.
7.9: ta'petq Nxi uaq Nxi ninb Bua kapq zunq zruj leib paaij, weig zu'g ninb Bua lovg siag Nxi fovg hxg ziab txvb cvj lovg siag Nxi Jiaj zipq.
7.16: weig zu'g ib zang yia kinq naaiq nxm pyauq yaag pun pyauq Zivb Revg weig lyepg yia Eei mevb yetg liud yem naaiq. yia Eei mziv, yia Eei Hruq xij zanb zang yem naaiq.
7.4: huvb tiaj Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen fovg hxg ziag.
7.10: Zyetq Laaj Eig zyepg faam uaq Nxi ninb heug zwavj myenb Rwrnj ninb Bua Eei pyauq. ninb Bua za'kevb Fyenb yrub a'Neiq weig zyruq zruj lovj pun Daa-witq Zauj saa-lo-mxn Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.
7.22: myenb zyrug tau, ‘laaij ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, tovb txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv Eei Tinb huvb. ninb Bua mivb pua'g zavg, fub suj, paaij Eiag Eei zyenb, zyruq Zivj pun ninb Bua zu'g naaiq teij Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.’+”
7.12: Ga'haaq maaib mwrnd zyruq hing Zwrtq pun ninb pwatg. zyruq kxvq, “yia mwavj haid meib tauj kauj Eei waag mig a'q. yia kinq naaiq nxm txvj weig yia kanb zruj nxm pyauq lovg fovg hxg puaq ziag.
7.15: yia zuvq nuvj mziv mavg, pcv mnxmb mwavj yem naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei waag.
7.13: “sij kxvq yia pun luvb haand maiq twib Byuvg, fai pun Jopg Eeig faanq taaib Eang naaiq nxm teib puv Eei kcvb zwavj, fai pun yia Eei pc'g fivj putq tomb wrnb pcvg,
7.1: saa-lo-mxn tauj kauj liud, trud yem luvb Fiag taaib, zia'g Qwi Revg puaq ziag Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq. zyruq Eei Favb laavg yaag yem pwavq pyauq.

29.18: Ga'haaq ninb Bua mivb Buaj he-se-Ki-yaa huvb, “yia Bua saaj Revg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq mig a'q, lyemb puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei ziab txvb Zauj ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, Zauj an Fuaq kevj Tinb huvb Eei tiab Zauj uaq nxm tiab Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig.
29.8: weig naaiq zyruq Qiaj Jiad yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem, zyrug pun ninb Bua penj kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq yaag hc'q myenb kamb Riaj yaag zu'g myenb Wrtq, Navq meib Bua Eei mziv tu'q pwatg Eei nx.
29.33: cvj kanb Za'levg fovg hxg weig zruj ziag Eei ka'naaiq maaib lua'g pc'q taub vovb kruq Zauj pua Zin taub pa'ki yuvb.
29.3: he-se-Ki-yaa zruj huvb ta'yetq Havj zib Laaj ninb Kxi zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kcvb yaag zxg kcvb.
29.32: kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb txb weig fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq maaib Zyetq zyepg taub vovb kruq, yetg pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb kruq Zauj Eig pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb kruq txn. naaiq teij yetg zuvq se weig fovg hxg puaq ziag pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq.
29.21: ninb Bua txb siag taub vovb kruq, siag taub pa'ki yuvb kruq, siag taub pa'ki yuvb kruq txn, Zauj siag taub yuvb kruq weig uaq nxm kua'q, weig sivj ting, yaag weig yu-Daa myenb fi'q zwid. huvb tiaj Paaiq aa-lon Eei zeib fun zwavj sai myenb, zx'q naaiq teij scvb Kuq an zyruq Eei ziab txvb fovg hxg ziag.
29.35: maiq taan maaib fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zamq, Zxg cvj maaib ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei scvb Kuq Mei, yaag maaib fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq Zauj Jyenq naaiq teij Ziaq ziag Eei a'vung tiuq. Navq naaiq nx, yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq fub suj Eei Jauq cvj lyepg Jiad Navq lod uaq nx.
29.14: he-maan Eei zeib fun maaib ye-hu-en Zauj si-me-i. ye-Du-Tun Eei zeib fun maaib se-mai-aa Zauj utg-si-en.
29.23: lovg fi'q zwid ziag Eei yuvb kruq ninb Bua txb taaib yem huvb tiaj Zauj kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen. ninb Bua yetg zuvq lovg puad maan Jyenq yuvb.
29.6: Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq zyepg zua'q. ziuj zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb mavg, ninb Bua zruj x'q Eei sig kwavg ninb yaag Win ti'g taand pun ninb yem Eei txvj.
29.34: mq paag sai myenb zo'g haig. mc'q scvb Kuq Eei Dopq maiq hivb. ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud, le-wi myenb, zyrug Tevj Tauj puaq ziag Eei kov zruj zyavj yaag Tauj zevg Fiag Eei sai myenb tu'q saaj Revg wij, weig zu'g kxvq Tauj saaj kanb Zivb Revg Eei Jauq nx, peiq sai myenb, le-wi myenb kaub zyepg zua'q Eei zruj.
29.2: ziuj zyruq mavg, he-se-Ki-yaa zruj tu'q hxpg Navq ninb Eei ovb Taaij zruj nx.
29.36: he-se-Ki-yaa Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj kevb xnb lx'g haig weig Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx Tevj pc'g fivj, weig zu'g za'kevb zruj tu'q Zwrtq syepq Eei.
29.20: ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei he-se-Ki-yaa Jiad sin taaib heug zivb Eei zwavj Jyen taaib zunq, zyrug faauj uaq Jiaj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
29.24: sai myenb zyrug taij yuvb, zx'q Ryaamq fovg hxg an ziab txvb weig fi'q i-saa-laa-en zwavj myenb Eei zwid, weig zu'g huvb tiaj Paaiq kxvq, xij zu'g weig i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb fovg hxg puaq ziag Zauj fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq.
29.28: kapq zunq yem uaq Eei myenb zyrug paaij. paauj Ruv Eei myenb paauj Ruv, pyomq Ratg Eei myenb yaag pyomq Ratg. Navq naaiq zruj Tauj fovg hxg puaq ziag zyavj.
29.7: ninb Bua kwrn zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb yaag pun tav taig. ninb Bua maiq puaq huv yaag maiq yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
29.29: puaq ziag liud, huvb tiaj cvj Zauj ninb yem uaq Eei yetg zuvq myenb zyrug kweig Fiag paaij.
29.19: tovb aa-hatg zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj, zx'q kwavg Eei yetg zuvq Jaab sig, ninb Bua liug leid Rxib cvj saaj Revg taaib a'q. ib zang naaiq teij ka'naaiq yem zyruq Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj.”
29.17: yem zib Laaj scvb yetq ninb Bua Jiad kxn saaj. Tauj scvb petq uaq Nxi ninb Bua saaj Tauj Zapq Zwrtq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj uaq nxm txvj. ninb Bua cvj lovg Yetg Nxi saaj zyruq Eei pyauq kanb. zib Laaj zyepg lua'g uaq Nxi ninb Bua saaj zyavj Revg.
29.31: he-se-Ki-yaa kxvq, “ib zang meib Bua saaj kanb Zivb Revg, fuvj pun zyruq mig a'q. kunq taaib fatq maa'b! txb fovg hxg ziag Eei Zauj fovg hxg weig lcvd zivb Eei ka'naaiq taaib Tauj zyruq Eei pyauq.” kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug txb scvb Kuq taaib ziag Zauj fovg hxg weig lcvd zivb Eei ka'naaiq. taub taub maaib Hruq zruj Eei myenb yaag txb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
29.30: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Paaiq le-wi myenb lovg Daa-witq Zauj kxvq zinb hod waag Eei myenb, aa-saapg, Eei waag paauj Ruv Zev zyruq. ninb Bua zyrug Fyenb Fyen yrub yrub Eei paauj Ruv yaag kweig Fiag paaij.
29.27: he-se-Ki-yaa zyrug Paaiq yem ziab txvb puaq ziag a'q. Jiad kxn fovg hxg puaq ziag uaq zang, zyrug Jiad kxn paauj Ruv Zev zyruq yaag maaib Ratg Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, Daa-witq, zruj Ruv Eei Jaab sig Zauj Jyenq.
29.11: yia Eei txn aa'b! ib zang maiq tuvq puvj lxj, weig zu'g zyruq kinq meib Bua taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Eei Ra'Myen fub suj ninb, puaq huv pun ninb.”
29.5: ninb kxvq, “le-wi myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b! xij zu'g saaj kanb Zivb Revg yaag saaj zyruq, meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, Eei pyauq Zivb Revg taaib. xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq Revg yem sivj ting maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq.
29.9: weig naaiq Bua Eei ovb Taaij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, Bua Eei aub Jweiq naamb Erud yaag zu'g Zaavq mivb.
29.16: sai myenb pia'g zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad pyenb Zwrtq ninb Bua lxd pwatg yetg zuvq maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq. le-wi myenb cvj pyenb Zwrtq mivb Tauj Kitg-lon hxvd.
29.4: ninb txb sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb pia'g taaib pun ninb Bua kapq zunq yem pyauq Eei tov puv mcvj.
29.10: ib zang yia tivg Hruq Zauj zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, lyepg vcvg waag weig pun ninb Qiaj Jiad, nrud Bua Eei Jauq leib Gxi Bua.
29.22: ninb Bua zyrug taij vovb kruq. sai myenb cvj txb Ryaamq fu'q ziab txvb. ninb Bua yaag taij uaq teij pa'ki yuvb kruq lovg yuvb kruq Eei Ryaamq fu'q ziab txvb. Ga'haaq ninb Bua taij uaq teij pa'ki yuvb kruq txn, lovg Ryaamq fu'q ziab txvb.
29.12: naaiq teij le-wi myenb zyrug Jiad kxn zruj kov a'q. Ko-haatq Eei zeib fun maaib aa-maa-saij Eei txn, maa-haatq, Zauj aa-saa-li-yaa Eei txn, yo-en. me-laa-li Eei zeib fun maaib apg-Di Eei txn, Kitq, Zauj ye-haan-le-len Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa. ke-son Eei zeib fun maaib simj-maa Eei txn, yo-aa, Zauj yo-aa Eei txn, e-Den.
29.15: ninb Bua heug ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud kapq zunq taaib saaj kanb Zivb Revg liud, zyrug ei Jyenq huvb tiaj lovg zyruq Eei waag Paaiq ninb Bua saaj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zivb Revg taaib.
29.13: e-li-saa-faan Eei zeib fun maaib sim-li Zauj ye-u-en. aa-saapg Eei zeib fun maaib, sej-Kaa-li-yaa Zauj matq-Taa-ni-yaa.
29.1: he-se-Ki-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q Eig zyepg Mmd Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Eig zyepg Juaq Havj. ninb Eei maa Eei Buaj heug aa-Bi-yaa, se sej-Kaa-li-yaa Eei sia'q.
29.26: le-wi myenb zyrug nanq Jyenq Daa-witq zruj Ruv Eei Jaab sig. sai myenb nanq Jyenq Ratg yaag sruq Jyenq uaq.
29.25: huvb tiaj cvj Paaiq le-wi myenb yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq. ninb Bua yaag maaib Zaaub zeiq Zauj tomb taanb paab, fiub taanb paab ziuj Daa-witq Zauj Tevj huvb tiaj kxvq zinb hod waag Eei myenb, kaatg, Zauj trug waag myenb, naa-Tan, Eei za'eij. naaiq se ziuj zyruq lovg ninb Eei trug waag myenb hatg Eei waag.

19.3: maiq kunq Navq naaig, Zxg pwatg meib maaib txvj lovj Eei, weig zu'g meib myetg Revg yem kua'q ka'Euad Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj, meib yaag lyepg tivg Hruq lxd Tinb huvb.”
19.8: yem ye-lu-saa-lem, ye-ho-saa-fatq yaag Paaiq teij le-wi myenb Zauj sai myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq weig zyruq syemq zwid, tunj sig, Tevj pc'g fivj Beng Rcv Eei sig. naaiq teij yem ye-lu-saa-lem.
19.4: ye-ho-saa-fatq yem ye-lu-saa-lem mq paag ninb cvj Zwrtq mivb ninb Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj yem Be-e-Qe-Baa mivb Tauj e-faa-im Eei Bovb aiq txvj. ninb txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
19.2: haa-naa-ni Eei txn, se trug waag myenb, ye-hu, Zwrtq taaib pwavb ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “meib hxpg zu'g Tevj myenb waaig myenb yaag Namq Rxv zyruq uaq teij myenb fai? weig naaiq meib zu'g zyruq nrud a'q.
19.6: ninb Buaj naaiq teij Beng sig Jyen, “xij zu'g faij fim lovb lovj Eei Namq Tauj meib zruj Eei sig weig zu'g meib Bua tunj Eei se maiq zeid weig myenb, se weig zyruq. meib Bua tunj sig Eei zyavb hog ninb Zauj meib Bua yem.
19.9: ye-ho-saa-fatq hatg ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g kamb Riaj zyruq, zyepg zua'q Eei zruj yaag lovg Revg Hruq zruj.
19.11: “ta'faanb kwei zyruq Eei Jauq, aa-maa-li-yaa tomb sai myenb kunq meib Bua. ta'faanb kwei huvb tiaj Eei Jauq, maaib yu-Daa fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq, i-saa-maa-en Eei txn, sej-Baa-Di-yaa, kunq meib Bua. maaib le-wi myenb zruj Jyen fub suj meib Bua. xij zu'g taamq Lo Eei Beng sig. Toq zyruq Zauj pcvb fim Eei myenb yem.”
19.5: ninb yem yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq weib wrnq Eei zivb, yetg nxm Jiaj yetg nxm, lyepg Beng sig Jyen.
19.7: ib zang meib Bua xij zu'g kamb Riaj zyruq. xij zu'g Buvb lovj meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg weig zu'g zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, maiq maaib maiq pcvb fim Eei sig, maiq Pyenj myenb yaag maiq zipq Eaanb Mwavj.
19.1: yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-saa-fatq, pcvb xn Eei Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, ninb Eei huvb ting uaq.
19.10: meib Bua Eei kxb yrud yem ninb Bua Eei haiq nxm zivb taaib lxd meib Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua maaib taij myenb Eei sig, fai txvg livg fai leib latg, fai leid fai leib Eeig, meib Bua xij zu'g Kwinj ninb Bua maiq tuvq paamd zwid txvg zyruq. maiq zei c'q, meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei kxb yrud zyrug zu'g ninb nrud. Navq naaiq nx zruj, meib Bua zyrug maiq maaib zwid a'q.

17.18: Jiaj mivb uaq taub se ye-ho-saa-Baatg Zauj yetg sinj Yetg waang taub txb Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king Eei pcv.
17.3: zyruq Zauj ye-ho-saa-fatq yem, weig zu'g taaub tavb uaq zang ninb Navq ninb Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq, yavb Eei Jauq. ninb maiq lxd Baa-an zyenb.
17.8: cvj maaib le-wi myenb Zauj ninb Bua mivb. maaib se-mai-aa, ne-Taa-ni-yaa, sej-Baa-Di-yaa, aa-saaj-hen, se-mi-laa-motq, ye-ho-naa-Tan, aa-Do-ni-yaa, To-Bi-yaa Zauj Topq-aa-Do-ni-yaa. cvj maaib e-li-saa-maa Zauj ye-ho-lam sai myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb.
17.19: naaiq teij myenb se fub suj huvb tiaj Eei myenb. cvj maaib tovb huvb tiaj pun yem kxmj yu-Daa Eei weib wrnq Eei zivb uaq teij pcv.
17.9: ninb Bua txb Jyenq zyruq Eei leib latg sru mivb kxmj yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb Faauj pc'g fivj.
17.7: ninb zruj huvb ta'faam Havj uaq Havj, ninb Paaiq ninb Eei Jyen, Ben-haa-in, o-Baa-Di, sej-Kaa-li-yaa, ne-Tan-en Zauj mi-Kaa-yaa mivb yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb Faauj pc'g fivj.
17.5: weig naaiq, zyruq lyepg kua'q wrnq yem ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei puab Diaq. yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb zyrug txb zivb Eeig fuvj pun ye-ho-saa-fatq. ninb zyrug za'kevb! putq zxib a'q, yaag tu'q myenb Taaib.
17.16: Jiaj mivb uaq taub, sikg-li Eei txn, aa-matq-yaa. ninb Zwrtq fim zruj weig fub suj zyruq. ninb txb i sinj taub Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv.
17.17: yem Ben-yaa-min fivj taaib maaib taub henq haig Eei pcv, e-li-yaa-Daa, Zauj Jyenq i sinj taub txb Jyenq Txvb paaib Zauj Jwavb zinj Eei pcv.
17.14: ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng maaib, yu-Daa fivj kunq yetg Zin taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq. tomb pcvb pyeiq, atg-naa, txb pua sinj taub Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv.
17.4: ninb lxd ninb Eei tia Eei Tinb huvb, ei Jyenq ninb Eei livg, maiq zwrtg i-saa-laa-en myenb zruj Eei sig.
17.2: ninb pun pcv yem Jyenq yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq weib wrnq Eei zivb, yaag pun pcv yem wrnq Eei txvj weig peu yu-Daa teig. ninb yaag pun pcv yem ninb Eei tia, aa-saaj, Zaavq taaib Eei e-faa-im teig.
17.6: ninb a'Neiq yavb zyruq Eei Jauq. ninb zuvq zx'q Gxi yu-Daa teig yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj Zauj aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj.
17.13: ninb yaag syru ka'naaiq Zamq! Eei yem yu-Daa Eei zivb. ninb yaag maaib Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv yem ye-lu-saa-lem.
17.12: ye-ho-saa-fatq kunq zruj kunq henq. ninb Zeij weib wrnq Eei pcvb Zyavq Zauj syru ka'naaiq Eei zivb.
17.15: Jiaj mivb uaq taub se tomb pcvb pyeiq, ye-ho-haa-nan, Zauj i sinj Yetg waang taub pcv.
17.11: maaib teij fi-li-saa-tia myenb txb ka'naaiq taaib zruj zivb Eeig, cvj txb Eaanb taaib zruj Rrub zinb. aa-lapg myenb yaag fuvj siag Zin Zyetq pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb kruq.
17.1: aa-saaj Eei txn, ye-ho-saa-fatq, Ripg Jyenq ninb Eei tia zruj huvb. ninb Zeij kanb henq weig Buvb i-saa-laa-en.
17.10: zyruq pun weib kxmj Eei kua'q kamb Riaj yu-Daa zyrug maiq kaamq mivb Zauj ye-ho-saa-fatq Bx'q Jaaj.

31.18: ninb Bua yaag faauj ninb Bua fu'Jweib faij Eei Buaj, lyemb ninb Bua Eei aub Jweiq naamb Erud, ninb Bua yetg zuvq myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei trub zov, weig zu'g ninb Bua zyepg zua'q Eei saaj kanb Zivb Revg.
31.3: huvb tiaj yaag fovg hxg ninb kanb Eei ka'naaiq weig Nxib Nxi luvb Dxm Zauj luvb maanb Mwavj puaq ziag Eei yaag weig tivb kov Nxi, pia'g syavb Laaj Zauj ziuj zyruq Eei leib latg tivg taaib Eei zipq fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
31.8: he-se-Ki-yaa Zauj zwavj Jyen taaib mavg pwatg naaiq teij Dwi Jyenq Eei ka'naaiq, ninb Bua Zev zyruq, yaag pwav waag pun ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.
31.19: aa-lon Eei zeib fun uaq teij sai myenb, tovb yem weib kxmj ninb Bua Eei zivb Eei miab Zyavq, fai yem ninb Bua Eei haiq nxm zivb, ziuj maaib Buaj tivg zyavj Eei myenb, zx'q pun Gxi Eei pwrng pun yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Eei taub taub mJavg txn Zauj yetg zuvq faauj Buaj yem le-wi myenb Eei trub zov taan.
31.9: he-se-Ki-yaa naaig sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb Tauj Dwi Jyenq naaiq teij ka'naaiq.

10.7: ninb Bua tau, “sij kxvq ib Nxi huvb tiaj xij naaiq teij pc'g fivj zruj pru yetg liud fub suj nx, tau lovj ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua a'Neiq. ninb Bua zyrug yetg liud zruj meib Eei pru a'q.”
10.5: le-hoj-Bo-am kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zuaq pua Nxi meib Bua cvj taaib lxd yia.” zwavj myenb zyrug Rwrnj a'q.
10.16: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb pwatg huvb tiaj maiq mwavj ninb Bua, ninb Bua zyrug kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “yia Bua Zauj Daa-witq maaib haiq Euvg pwrng? yia Bua Zauj Jyetg-si Eei txn maiq maaib yia Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. o i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq a'q. o Daa-witq aag, kruj meib kanb Eei huvb trub maa'b!” i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug Rwrnj pyauq mig a'q.
10.17: mq paag le-hoj-Bo-am Zxg kunq yem yu-Daa teig Eei zivb Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb.
10.14: le-hoj-Bo-am huvb lovg myenb lunj myenb Zaavb laavb Eei za'eij. ninb kxvq, “yia Eei tia pun meib Bua kaad Dyavb kaad Niaq. yia zuvq xij pun meib Bua kaad kaub Niaq. yia Eei tia lovg pyaab pin Bx'q meib Bua. yia xij lovg zyepg Eeig Daavb pin Bx'q meib Bua.”
10.4: “meib Eei tia, saa-lo-mxn, hxig yia Bua Kruq, Navq kaad Dyavb kaad Niaq nx. ib zang Toq meib zanq Fiag yia Bua zu'g Kruq Eei Jauq yaag pun yia Bua kaad Eei Dyavb kaad kaub hev, yia Bua yetg zuvq zyrug fub suj meib.”
10.2: (uaq zang ne-Batg Eei txn, ye-lo-Bo-am, Zxg yem i-yipq teib puv weig zu'g ninb pyauj saa-lo-mxn huvb mivb yem i-yipq.) ye-lo-Bo-am yetq haid ninb Bua xij lyepg le-hoj-Bo-am zruj huvb, ninb yem i-yipq Rwrnj.
10.6: le-hoj-Bo-am huvb zyrug Zauj zinb Daavg ninb Eei tia, saa-lo-mxn, yem seij zavg uaq zang Tevj ninb Eei tia zruj kov Eei myenb koj myenb Zaavb laavb. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua Tevj yia Namq kaaj, yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau naaiq teij myenb?”
10.13: huvb tiaj lovg waag Zyruq Eei tau pc'g fivj. ninb maiq lovg uaq teij myenb koj myenb Zaavb laavb Eei waag.
10.12: Tauj ta'faam Nxi, ye-lo-Bo-am Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj cvj taaib lxd le-hoj-Bo-am Navq huvb tiaj kxvq nx. ninb kxvq, “zuaq pua Nxi cvj taaib lxd yia.”
10.15: huvb tiaj zyrug maiq mwavj pc'g fivj Toq Eei waag. naaiq teij sig se ei Tinb huvb Eei za'eij weig pun txij zyruq lovg si-lo myenb, aa-hi-yaa, trug pun ne-Batg Eei txn ye-lo-Bo-am, Eei waag.
10.11: yia Eei tia pun meib Bua kaad Dyavb kaad Niaq. yia zuvq xij pun meib Bua kaub Niaq. yia Eei tia lovg pyaab pin Bx'q meib Bua. yia xij lovg zyepg Eeig Daavb pin Bx'q meib Bua.’+”
10.1: le-hoj-Bo-am mivb se-Kem zivb weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb mivb se-Kem lyepg ninb zruj huvb.
10.10: Zauj ninb Lo taaib naaiq teij myenb lunj myenb kxvq, “naaiq teij pc'g fivj kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, ‘meib Eei tia pun yia Bua kaad Dyavb kaad Niaq, Toq meib pun yia Bua hev teij.’ huvb tiaj xij zu'g Buaj naaiq teij myenb, ‘yia Eei puab Do'g txn kaub hod yia Eei tia Eei Jaaiq.

22.3: aa-hatg-yaa yaag ei Jyenq aa-hapg uaq pyauq myenb Eei za'eij zruj, weig zu'g ninb Eei maa Faauj ninb zruj waaig.
22.8: ye-hu tivg Jyenq aa-hapg Eei pyauq zov myenb Eei zwid uaq zang, ninb lxd pwatg yu-Daa Eei pyeiq zeiq Zauj aa-hatg-yaa Eei fun, weig zu'g ninb Bua kan Jyenq ninb taaib. ye-hu zyrug taij Revg ninb Bua.
22.9: aa-hatg-yaa pivj Jyenq yem saa-maa-lia, ye-hu Qa'q lxd. ye-hu Eei myenb zx'q aa-hatg-yaa txb mivb pun ye-hu, ye-hu zyrug taij ninb a'q. ninb Bua zx'q ninb zavj Jyenq weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq, “ninb se ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei fun. ye-ho-saa-fatq lovg Revg Hruq lxd zyruq. ” Navq naaig aa-hatg-yaa Eei trub zov maiq maaib haiq taub haib kunq teib puv.
22.7: aa-hatg-yaa Fiag mivb pwavb yo-lam zyrug zu'g myetg se ziuj Tinb huvb tivg taaib Eei za'eij. weig zu'g aa-hatg-yaa mivb uaq zang, ninb Zauj yo-lam Zwrtq mivb pwavb nim-si Eei txn, ye-hu, tovb zyruq lovg yrub xn taaib weig myetg aa-hapg Eei trub zov.
22.5: ninb ei Jyenq uaq teij myenb Zaavb laavb Eei waag Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg Eei txn, yo-lam, mivb laa-motq-ki-le-aatg Zauj si-lia Eei huvb, haa-saa-en, Bx'q Jaaj. si-lia myenb yaag zruj pun yo-lam zu'g mun.
22.4: ziuj zyruq mavg ninb zruj waaig sig, Navq aa-hapg uaq pyauq myenb zruj, weig zu'g ninb Eei tia taig liud, maaib aa-hapg Eei myenb zruj ninb Eei Zaavb laavb myenb zyrug txb ninb zu'g paaig a'q.
22.2: aa-hatg-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog, Havb Jeiq tu'q Eig zyepg Eeig Havj.  ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq yetg Havj. ninb Eei maa se om-li Eei sia'g fun, aa-Taa-li-yaa.
22.6: yo-lam zyrug Rwrnj Tauj yitq-le-en zxg ninb yem laa-motq Zauj si-lia huvb, haa-saa-en, Bx'q Jaaj zu'g mun Eei txvj. yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-lam Eei txn, aa-hatg-yaa, zyrug Fiag Tauj yitq-le-en mavg aa-hapg Eei txn, yo-lam, weig zu'g yo-lam zu'g mun.
22.12: yo-aatg Zauj ninb Bua yem Ju'q Havj, pivj Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad. aa-Taa-li-yaa yaag kunq teib puv.
22.11: mq paag ye-ho-lam huvb Eei sia'q, ye-ho-Qe-Baa, zx'q aa-hatg-yaa Eei txn, yo-aatg, yem xij zu'g taij taig Eei huvb txn Bu'Dovj nimg Zwrtq taaib. ye-ho-Qe-Baa txb yo-aatg Zauj txb yo-aatg uaq taub pru pivj Jyenq yetg Qovj ken. Navq naaig ye-ho-lam huvb Eei sia'q, se ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb Eei auq, weig ninb zruj aa-hatg-yaa Eei muag, ninb pivj yo-aatg, maiq pun zu'g aa-Taa-li-yaa taij.
22.1: ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj lyepg ye-ho-lam Eei txnb faij, aa-hatg-yaa, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb, weig zu'g kan aa-lapg myenb taaib Tauj Zyavq uaq kwanb myenb, taij Revg aa-hatg-yaa Eei zwavj kxj. yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-lam, Eei txn, aa-hatg-yaa, zyrug faauj weig kunq a'q.
22.10: aa-hatg-yaa Eei maa pwatg ninb Eei txn zu'g taij taig, ninb zyrug Jiad kxn taij yu-Daa trub zov maaib huvb trub Eei myenb.

12.3: maaib yetg Zin Eig pc'q Jaaj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia, Ju'q waang taub keb maad Eei pcv, Zauj yem i-yipq kan ninb taaib Eei li-Bia myenb, su-Ki-im myenb, Zauj e-Ti-o-pia myenb Zamq! haig, zuvq saauq maiq hivb.
12.8: mq paag ninb Bua Zxg xij zu'g yem ninb Eei puab Diaq zyrug haib hiuq tu'q fub suj yia Zauj fub suj kanb nxm kua'q Eei myenb Navq haiq nx kanb Euvg.”
12.9: i-yipq Eei huvb, si-sakq, zyrug taaib Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb zx'q yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad Zauj huvb ting ka'Euad yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq. ninb zx'q Euvb Euvg, lyemb saa-lo-mxn zruj taaib Eei Jyemb Txvb paaib.
12.7: zyruq pwatg ninb Bua Eyemg kanb zruj faij, se-mai-aa zyrug tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag. zyruq kxvq, “yia pwatg ninb Bua Eyemg kanb zruj faij, yia zyrug maiq myetg ninb Bua. zuvq xij Fruj teij ninb Bua, maiq Qiaj Jiad Tauj taaub zyrug maiq pun si-sakq myetg ye-lu-saa-lem.
12.5: uaq zang trug waag myenb, se-mai-aa, mivb lxd le-hoj-Bo-am Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq. laaij si-sakq Eei Jaub lrug ninb Bua kapq zunq yem ye-lu-saa-lem. se-mai-aa kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj meib Bua, ‘meib Bua kwavg yia, yia zyrug kwavg meib Bua zu'g yem si-sakq Eei puab Diaq.’+”
12.16: le-hoj-Bo-am kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq yem Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb Eei txn, aa-Bi-yaa, Ripg Jyenq zruj huvb.
12.14: le-hoj-Bo-am zruj waaig sig, weig zu'g ninb maiq lyepg tivg Hruq lxd zyruq.
12.4: si-sakq huvb Zaavq tu'q yem yu-Daa teig weib wrnq Eei zivb cvj taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
12.2: le-hoj-Bo-am zruj huvb ta'Mmd Havj uaq Havj, laaij ninb Bua maiq zyepg zua'q Eei kan zyruq, i-yipq Eei si-sakq huvb taaib Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem.
12.6: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq Zauj huvb tiaj Eyemg kanb zruj faij cvj kxvq, “zyruq zruj tu'q hxpg.”
12.13: le-hoj-Bo-am huvb yem ye-lu-saa-lem lyepg kanb zruj huvb wrnq Eei. le-hoj-Bo-am Jiad kxn kunq uaq zang, Havb Jeiq tu'q feij zyepg yetq Havj. ninb yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq zyepg Zyetq Havj. ye-lu-saa-lem se zyruq yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj fivj Bu'Dovj kinq Zwrtq taaib weig lyepg ninb Eei mevb. le-hoj-Bo-am Eei maa se am-mon myenb, Buaj heug naa-aa-maa.
12.12: le-hoj-Bo-am Eyemg kanb zruj faij Eei zyavb hog, zyruq maiq Qiaj Jiad ninb a'q. maiq taan Bua'g naaiq, yu-Daa yaag tu'q lovj.
12.15: le-hoj-Bo-am zruj Eei sig yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, fiaq Jyenq trug waag myenb, se-mai-aa, Eei srub taan Zauj mavg zinb hod uaq taub itg-Do Eei srub taan. le-hoj-Bo-am Zauj ye-lo-Bo-am zanb zang maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig.
12.11: huvb tiaj haiq zang pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, kruj huvb ting Eei pcv txb naaiq teij Txvb paaib mivb. Ga'haaq ninb Bua cvj txb Rwrnj an Jyenq pcv zuaq huvb ting Eei txvj.
12.1: le-hoj-Bo-am Eei kua'q lyepg wrnq yaag henq Eei zyavb hog, ninb kwavg zyruq Eei leib latg. pc'g fivj yaag kan Jyenq kwavg.
12.10: le-hoj-Bo-am huvb zyrug lovg tovb si'q zruj Txvb paaib tiq Jyemb Txvb paaib Jiu pun kruj huvb ting zuaq kcvb Eei pcvb pyeiq.

15.18: ninb zx'q tovb ninb Eei tia Zauj ninb kanb fovg hxg pun Eei Jyem Eaanb Zauj Jaab txvj fuvj pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
15.3: zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq maaib zyen Tinb huvb, maiq maaib sai myenb Faauj, yaag maiq maaib leib latg laub haig a'q.
15.8: aa-saaj yetq haid o-Detg Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, trug taaib naaiq teij waag, ninb Eei Hruq zyrug henq Jiad taaib. ninb zyrug yem yu-Daa teig Zauj Ben-yaa-min teig, lyemb yem e-faa-im Bovb aiq txvj Zaavq taaib Eei nxmb nxm zivb Zc'q Gxi ninb Bua Eei kamb Riaq haig Eei miub favj. ninb yaag zxg yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zapq Zwrtq Eei txvj Ra'Myen mcvj, zyruq Eei ziab txvb.
15.19: yem naaiq mivb Tauj aa-saaj zruj huvb faab zyepg Mmd Havj uaq Havj, maiq maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig.
15.9: ninb yaag heug yu-Daa myenb Zauj Ben-yaa-min myenb, yaag heug tovb Zauj ninb yem uaq teij e-faa-im, maa-natq-sej Zauj si-me-on taaib Eei pc'g fivj, kapq zunq taaib. maaib naaiq teij myenb Zamq Eei yem i-saa-laa-en Zwrtq taaib lxd ninb weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj ninb yem.
15.7: mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g henq, maiq tuvq swei weig zu'g meib Bua Eei kov xij tu'q zipq zivb Eeig.”
15.5: uaq teij zyavb hog, myenb pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq maiq maaib pcvb xn weig zu'g maaib faanq lung Eei Jauq Zamq Eei hxig uaq teij nxmb nxm kua'q Eei yetg zuvq myenb Kruq.
15.16: aa-saaj huvb yaag pun ninb Eei kuj, maa-aa-Kaa, Twij weig, maiq tu'q zruj huvb kuj, weig zu'g ninb zruj kamb Riaq haig Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj. aa-saaj kxij uaq nxm favj, Bx'q mwrng Revg, cvj yem Kitg-lon hxvd puaq kwavg.
15.17: maiq kunq ninb maiq Zc'q kwavg i-saa-laa-en teib puv yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj, yem aa-saaj Eei seij zeiq ninb Eei Hruq zyepg zua'q Eei kan zyruq.
15.14: ninb Bua zyrug Qiaj Lo Eei heug yaag pyomq Ratg pyomq Jxv hruq Jyenq lcvd waag pun zyruq.
15.4: mq paag ninb Bua pwavb zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua Win Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb zyrug pun ninb Bua lxd tu'q pwatg a'q.
15.2: ninb zyrug Zwrtq mivb pwavb aa-saaj, kxvq Buaj ninb, “aa-saaj huvb Zauj yu-Daa Zauj Ben-yaa-min Eei yetg zuvq myenb aa'b! Toq mwavj yia kxvq maa'b! ta'faanb meib Bua kan zyruq, ninb zyrug Zauj meib Bua yem. sij kxvq meib Bua lxd ninb, ninb zyrug pun meib Bua lxd tu'q pwatg. mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua kwavg ninb, ninb zyrug kwavg meib Bua.
15.6: ninb Bua zu'g pun Gxi Revg. naaiq nxm kua'q Zauj uaq nxm kua'q, naaiq nxm zivb Zauj uaq nxm zivb pun Gxi, weig zu'g Tinb huvb pun Euvb Euvg ze'g naang hxig ninb Bua lung.
15.13: ta'faanb haiq taub maiq Kavq lxd zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g taij kwavg a'q, maiq kunq Lo faij, mJavg msia'q.
15.12: ninb Bua zyrug lyepg Jiad vcvg waag kxvq ninb Bua pwavq Hruq pwavq eij xij lxd zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
15.15: yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb weig ninb Bua hruq Jyenq waag a'Neiq, weig zu'g ninb Bua pwavq Hruq zruj. ninb Bua yaag pwavq eij lxd zyruq. ninb zyrug pun ninb Bua lxd tu'q pwatg. zyruq yaag pun ninb Bua puvb puv pcvb xn.
15.11: tovb uaq Nxi ninb Bua zx'q Bx'q Jaaj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq, vovb Zyetq pc'q taub, pa'ki yuvb siag Zin taub, fovg hxg puaq ziag pun zyruq.
15.1: Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib yem o-Detg Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa.
15.10: aa-saaj zruj huvb tu'q zyepg Mmd Havj uaq Havj faab Laaj, ninb Bua kapq zunq yem ye-lu-saa-lem.

13.18: uaq Rung i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g swei. yu-Daa myenb tu'q hivb, weig zu'g ninb Bua Kauj zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb.
13.8: “ib zang meib Namq taaib meib xij vcvg zyruq Eei kua'q, se yem Daa-witq Eei zeib fun Eei puab Diaq Eei kua'q. meib Bua myenb kevb Zamq haig yaag maaib Jyem zruj taaib Eei vovb txn, tovb ye-lo-Bo-am zruj taaib txvj meib Bua Eei zyenb.
13.3: aa-Bi-yaa txb pyei sinj taub kinq taaib Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv. ye-lo-Bo-am maaib Yetg sinj taub kinq taaib Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv txij aa-Bi-yaa Baib Jyenq xij Bx'q Jaaj.
13.21: mq paag aa-Bi-yaa henq Jyenq faauj. ninb lovg zyepg feij taub auq. maaib Eig zyepg Eeig taub txn, zyepg lua'g taub sia'q.
13.14: yu-Daa Win Rwrnj pwatg uaq Daavg mcvj Zauj Ga'haaq Gaav maaib pcv, ninb Bua zyrug heug zyruq. sai myenb yaag pyomq Ratg.
13.6: maiq kunq Navq naaig, Daa-witq Eei txn, saa-lo-mxn, Eei yetg taub Jyen, se ne-Batg Eei txn, ye-lo-Bo-am, vcvg ninb Eei zyruq.
13.2: ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq pua Havj. ninb Eei maa Eei Buaj heug mi-Kaa-yaa, se ki-Be-aa myenb, u-li-en, Eei sia'q. aa-Bi-yaa Zauj ye-lo-Bo-am maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jauq Zwrtq.
13.20: yem aa-Bi-yaa Eei seij zeiq ye-lo-Bo-am maiq tu'q cvj henq Jyenq faauj. zyruq yaag taij ninb taig a'q.
13.7: maaib teij maiq lamb lovg Eei myenb waaig myenb taaib zunq kan ninb yaag Zauj saa-lo-mxn Eei txn, le-hoj-Bo-am, txib tekg. uaq zang le-hoj-Bo-am Havb Jeiq lunj, Hruq mau, vcvg maiq hivb ninb Bua.
13.19: aa-Bi-yaa zung ye-lo-Bo-am yaag Zaavq tu'q ninb Eei pua nxm zivb, Betg-en, ye-saa-naa Zauj e-fo-lon cvj Zauj weib kxmj naaiq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
13.17: aa-Bi-yaa Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv taij ninb Bua Zamq Eei. i-saa-laa-en myenb kinq taaib Eei pcv maaib pyaa sinj taub zu'g taij taig.
13.11: ninb Bua Dxmb Dxm mwrnb mwrnd fovg hxg puaq ziag yaag puaq huv pun zyruq. ninb Bua yaag zx'q kevj Eei Fuaq an uaq nxm Zivb Revg tiab. ninb Bua yaag kruj Jyemb tavb Jaaj Zauj tavb zaanq, weig Nxib Nxi luvb maanb Mwavj tyemq. weig zu'g yia Bua ei Jyenq zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, hatg Eei waag. mq paag meib Bua kwavg ninb.
13.5: meib Bua maiq hiuq Eei fai? zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, lovg Rauq lyepg vcvg waag Zeij pun Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun yetg liud zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en.
13.9: meib Bua zung zyruq Eei sai myenb, se aa-lon Eei zeib fun, yaag zung le-wi myenb pyauj, cvj lyepg meib Bua kanb Eei sai myenb Navq kanb nxm kua'q Eei myenb lyepg nx, maiq zeid? maiq kunq haiq taub txb yetg taub vovb kruq txn Zauj siag taub pa'ki yuvb kruq taaib saaj wij zyrug tu'q zruj tovb maiq zeid penj zyenb Eei sai myenb.
13.16: i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj yu-Daa myenb. Tinb huvb zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Jiu pun yem yu-Daa Eei puab Diaq.
13.4: aa-Bi-yaa yem e-faa-im Eei Bovb aiq txvj sej-maa-laa-im Bov kub vwaaig kxvq, “ye-lo-Bo-am Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb aa'b! mwavj yia kxvq maa'b!
13.10: “mq paag yia Bua kanb c'q, zyruq se yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia Bua yaag maiq kwavg ninb. fub suj zyruq Eei sai myenb se aa-lon Eei zeib fun. le-wi myenb yaag Tevj ninb Bua ziuj ninb Bua hxpg zu'g zruj Eei pwrng.
13.22: yem aa-Bi-yaa kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig, ninb zruj Eei Zauj kxvq Eei yetg zuvq fiaq Jyenq trug waag myenb, itg-Do, Eei srub taan.
13.12: Tinb huvb Zauj yia Bua yem, zruj tovb txb yia Bua uaq taub. ninb Eei sai myenb nanq Jyenq Ratg xij pyomq weig pun yia Bua Zauj meib Bua Bx'q Jaaj. i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! maiq tuvq Zauj zyruq, meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, Bx'q Jaaj, weig zu'g meib Bua Bx'q maiq hivb.”
13.15: yu-Daa myenb Qa'q heug Zwrtq Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj. yu-Daa myenb heug Zwrtq uaq zang, Tinb huvb pun ye-lo-Bo-am Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yem aa-Bi-yaa Zauj yu-Daa Eei Ra'Myen zu'g swei.
13.13: ye-lo-Bo-am Paaiq pcv pivj Jyenq mivb yem yu-Daa pcv Eei Ga'haaq Gaav. ye-lo-Bo-am Eei Junb pcv zyrug yem yu-Daa Eei Ra'Myen mcvj. pivj Jyenq uaq teij pcv yem Ga'haaq.
13.1: ne-Batg Eei txn, ye-lo-Bo-am, zruj huvb zyepg petq Havj uaq Havj, aa-Bi-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa.

1.3: saa-lo-mxn Zauj kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug mivb ki-Be-on yem Lav Eei txvj, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Eei wig pwavb Dopg liub yem uaq, se zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, yem teib puvb Waav zruj taaib uaq nxm Dopg liub.
1.8: saa-lo-mxn tau Tinb huvb, “meib pun Ziv meib zyepg zua'q Eei Namq yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, yaag pun yia Ripg Jyenq tia zruj huvb.
1.9: zyruq Tinb huvb aag, Toq pun meib Zauj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen, weig zu'g meib pun yia zruj huvb kunq naaiq fivj myenb Dovg luvb Diaq Eei niab Buv Zamq.
1.7: tovb uaq mwrnd Tinb huvb hing Zwrtq pun saa-lo-mxn pwatg yaag kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib xij yia Zeij haiq Euvg pun meib, kunq Toq a'q”
1.5: hu-aa Eei fun, u-li Eei txn, Be-saa-len, zruj uaq nxm tovb si'q ziab txvb yaag yem ki-Be-on, zyruq Eei Dopg liub Ra'Myen mcvj. saa-lo-mxn Zauj kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug yem uaq Toq zyruq.
1.16: saa-lo-mxn Eei maad se yem i-yipq Zauj Ku-e txb taaib. huvb tiaj Eei scvb eij myenb ziuj tivg Eei Jaab zinb maaid Ku-e Eei maad.
1.17: yem i-yipq maaid taaib Eei Bx'q Jaaj Zia yetg nxm pyei Jxib zyepg feij luvd Eaanb. yetg taub maad yetg Jxib Eig luvd. ninb Bua yaag maaig mivb pun hitq-Tai myenb Zauj si-lia Eei zwavj huvb tiaj.
1.14: saa-lo-mxn syru Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj maad. ninb maaib yetg Zin feij pc'q nxm Bx'q Jaaj maab Zia yaag maaib yetg waang i Zin taub maad. maad Zauj maab Zia an Jyenq syru Bx'q Jaaj Zia Eei zivb yaag maaib teij Zauj ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem.
1.4: (mq paag Daa-witq txb Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem Ki-li-yaatq-ye-aa-lim Tauj ninb liug leid zyavj Eei txvj, weig zu'g ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem weig lcvd vcvg waag faav Zxv Dopg liub.)
1.2: saa-lo-mxn Paaiq i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, se Paaiq kunq yetg Zin, kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq, Zauj tomb Jyen Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq Zauj puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq.
1.6: saa-lo-mxn zyrug yem wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub, zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, tovb si'q ziab txvb uaq fovg hxg yetg Zin taub scvb Kuq an ziab txvb kub vwaaig puaq ziag.
1.13: saa-lo-mxn zyrug yem ki-Be-on, Lav Eei txvj, wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Ra'Myen, Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb yaag kunq i-saa-laa-en teib puv.
1.12: yia zyrug Zeij Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav pun meib. yia yaag xij Zeij zinb zxib, yaag pun meib putq zxib, maaib mevb taub Lo. peiq zinb Daavg Eei huvb tiaj Zauj Ga'haaq Eei huvb tiaj, maiq maaib haiq taub Dovg meib.”
1.15: huvb tiaj yem ye-lu-saa-lem pun Jyem pun Eaanb Zamq Eei, penj Prub Tov Eei ka'naaiq Navq la'pyeiq nx. sij-Daa zovb Dyavj yaag Dovg Bovb Jua'q txvj Eei vovb Exj Dyavj Zamq.
1.11: Tinb huvb tau saa-lo-mxn, “weig zu'g meib maaib naaiq Euvg Hruq, yaag maiq Toq zinb zxib, maiq Toq pun meib putq zxib fai tu'q mevb taub Lo, yaag maiq Toq pun meib Eei winb wavq zu'g taig, yaag maiq Toq syrug Ewrnb Daauq, Kuvj Toq Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav weig kunq yia Eei pc'g fivj, tovb yia pun meib zruj huvb kunq Eei pc'g fivj,
1.1: Daa-witq Eei txn, saa-lo-mxn, kunq i-saa-laa-en kua'q wrnq Eei. zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj ninb yem, pun ninb tu'q zruj za'kevb! Lo haig.
1.10: Toq pun yia maaib Zovb mevb, maaib wrnb zaav txb naaiq teij myenb, weig zu'g haiq taub haib kunq tu'q meib Eei naaiq teij pc'g fivj Dovg naaig Zamq?”

26.18: ninb Bua paaq Jyenq utg-si-yaa, cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “utg-si-yaa aa'b! se maiq zeid meib hxpg zu'g puaq huv pun zyruq. se aa-lon Eei zeib fun, saaj kanb Zivb Revg Eei sai myenb, hxpg zu'g puaq. meib Zwrtq sivj ting maa'b! meib zruj txvg mig a'q. meib maiq haib tu'q zyruq Tinb huvb Taaib yetg teij a'q.
26.8: am-mon myenb Zwrtq Rrub zinb pun utg-si-yaa. ninb Eei mevb taub siv Tauj i-yipq Eei kapg Jaaij, weig zu'g ninb za'kevb henq haig.
26.3: utg-si-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang, ninb tu'q zyepg lua'g Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Mmd zyepg Eeig Havj. ninb Eei maa Eei Buaj heug ye-Ko-li-yaa, se ye-lu-saa-lem myenb.
26.21: utg-si-yaa huvb putq komb huq pcvg Tauj ninb kwei seij Eei Nxi. weig zu'g ninb putq komb huq pcvg ninb xij zu'g kanb Za'levg yem, zu'g Gc'q Jyenq maiq pun pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq. ninb Eei txn, yo-Taam, kruj huvb ting yaag kunq pc'g fivj.
26.14: utg-si-yaa weig zwavj Junb pcv liug leid Txvb paaib, Zav, Bx'q Jaaj Eei muag Zauj lwi, Jwavb zinj Zauj lovg Dopg Laav puvj Eei la'pyeiq.
26.23: utg-si-yaa kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq nitq huvb tiaj Eei zruq uaq Rov Dau, weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq, “ninb putq komb huq pcvg.” ninb Eei txn, yo-Taam, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
26.6: ninb Zwrtq mivb Bx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb, Zc'q Revg katg zivb, yapq-ne zivb Zauj atg-Dotg zivb Eei zivb laatg. ninb cvj Zeij Jiad nitq atg-Dotg Eei ziaj nxm muvq Zauj yem fi-li-saa-tia myenb Bu'Dovj Eei ziaj nxm muvq.
26.2: ninb Eei tia, aa-maa-si-yaa, kwei seij mig a'q, Ga'haaq utg-si-yaa cvj syavb Zeij Jiad e-latq zivb yaag fuvj Rwrnj pun yu-Daa.
26.20: aa-saa-li-yaa tomb sai myenb Zauj zwavj sai myenb mavg ninb, pwatg ninb Eei pyxvb putq komq huq pcvg, ninb Bua kaanq Jyenq fovq ninb Zwrtq. ninb kanb syepg syepq Eei Zwrtq weig zu'g zyruq tivg ninb Eei zwid.
26.7: Tinb huvb Tevj ninb Bx'q fi-li-saa-tia myenb Zauj yem ku-aa-Baa-an Eei aa-lapg myenb, yaag Tevj ninb Bx'q me-u-ni myenb.
26.19: utg-si-yaa zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig. uaq zang ninb nanq Jyenq huvb lrub xij puaq huv. ninb Qiaj Jiad sai myenb uaq zang, komb huq pcvg zyrug yem ninb Eei pyxvb putq Zwrtq txv Jyenq zwavj sai myenb, yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad puaq huv tiab ka'Len.
26.17: aa-saa-li-yaa sai myenb Zauj Jyenq zyruq Eei petq zyepg taub taamq Lo Eei sai myenb kan Jyenq ninb pia'g.
26.11: utg-si-yaa cvj maaib ho'g zyavj haib Bx'q Jaaj Eei Junb pcv, liug leid zyavj Zwrtq mivb penj yetg kwanb yetg kwanb ziuj ye-i-en sai myenb Zauj taub Jyen, Buaj heug maa-aa-sej-aa, tivg taaib Eei sruj mrug. naaiq teij i taub yem huvb Eei yetg taub Jyen, haa-nan-yaa, Eei puab Diaq.
26.5: sej-Kaa-li-yaa Zxg zyavb Jyenq Eei seij zeiq, utg-si-yaa lyepg tivg Hruq lxd Tinb huvb, weig zu'g sej-Kaa-li-yaa Faauj ninb Taaib Tinb huvb. ta'faanb ninb lxd zyruq, Tinb huvb pun ninb tu'q lovj.
26.9: utg-si-yaa Zeij Jiad laaub yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei kx'q kcvb Zauj hxvb kcvb, cvj Zauj zivb laatg Rwrnj Fwrtq Eei txvj yaag zruj naaiq teij zivb laaub wrnq Eei.
26.16: mq paag utg-si-yaa henq Jyenq faauj, ninb Eei Hruq zyrug mauj, zyav naaig zruj kxn pun ninb zu'g paaig. ninb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad yem puaq huv tiab xij puaq huv.
26.4: ziuj zyruq mavg, ninb zruj tu'q hxpg, Navq ninb Eei tia, aa-maa-si-yaa, zruj Eei yetg zuvq nx.
26.10: ninb yem teib puv Zeij ziaj nxm laaub, yaag wetq Zamb nxm syru uam Eei Kwrtq weig zu'g ninb maaib scvb Kuq kwanb Zamq yem Bovb Jua'q Zauj Daub pcvb. ninb maaib myenb Tevj ninb zruj Deig yaag yem Bovb aiq Zauj Daub lovj Eei txvj Tevj ninb fyruj a'vung Wivj weig zu'g ninb Namq lyavb Deig.
26.22: utg-si-yaa zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig, yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, aa-mxtq Eei txn, trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, fiaq Jyenq Eei.
26.12: puvb pwrng Eei yetg zuvq pyeiq zeiq, tovb kunq Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv, maaib i Zin lua'g pc'q taub.
26.15: yem ye-lu-saa-lem ninb pun maaib puab taub Eei zavg myenb Namq Zwrtq za'eij zruj Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king an Jyenq zivb laatg Eei laaub Zauj zivb kx'q Eei laaub, weig pwrnq Jwavb zinj yaag puvj tomb la'pyeiq. utg-si-yaa Eei mevb taub siv mivb ko Eei, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Tevj ninb Zamq, ninb zyrug henq! haig.
26.13: ninb Bua kunq Eei Junb pcv maaib pua sinj siag Zin Mmd pc'q taub maaib Qa'q henq, Tevj tu'q huvb tiaj Bx'q hivb ninb Eei winb wavq.
26.1: yu-Daa Eei zwavj pc'g fivj lyepg aa-maa-si-yaa Eei txn, utg-si-yaa, Ripg Jyenq ninb Eei tia, aa-maa-si-yaa, zruj huvb. uaq zang utg-si-yaa tu'q zyepg lua'g Havj.

25.18: mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ye-ho-aatg, cvj Paaiq myenb Buaj yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-maa-si-yaa, “yem le-Baa-nxn Bov maaib zuvb Fimq pun waag mivb Buaj tiub yem le-Baa-nxn Bov Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, ‘puvj meib Eei sia'q pun yia Eei txn lovg zruj auq.’ Ga'haaq maaib taub Yiab zxib taaib Zaaiq uaq zuvb Fimq.
25.8: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua Namq taaib lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij meib haib Bx'q Jaaj kaub henq nx, Tinb huvb xij pun meib Bua txv Jyenq winb wavq zu'g swei, weig zu'g Tinb huvb maaib Qa'q Tevj myenb hivb fai zu'g paaig.”
25.3: aa-maa-si-yaa yetq tu'q kunq Jyenq kua'q wrnq Eei, ninb zx'q tovb zinb Daavg taij ninb Eei tia uaq teij Jyen, taij Revg ninb Bua.
25.21: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ye-ho-aatg, zyrug taaib yem yu-Daa Eei Betg-se-metq muvq Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-maa-si-yaa, txij Myen Bx'q Jaaj.
25.14: aa-maa-si-yaa taij liud e-Dom myenb Rwrnj taaib, ninb txb Jyenq sej-i myenb uaq teij miub favj Rwrnj cvj lyepg taaib weib kanb Eei zyenb, zyrug paaij yaag puaq huv.
25.23: yem Betg-se-metq, i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ye-ho-aatg, zx'q tu'q aa-hatg-yaa Eei fun, ye-ho-aatg Eei txn, yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-maa-si-yaa. cvj txb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb yaag Zc'q waaig zivb laatg yem e-faa-im laatg kcvb mivb Tauj kx'q Eei kcvb.
25.6: ninb cvj lovg i Zin yetg pc'q Jxib Eaanb Zivq yetg sinj taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Zauj ninb mivb.
25.2: ziuj zyruq mavg, aa-maa-si-yaa zruj hxpg Eei sig, mq paag maiq zeid pwavq Hruq zruj.
25.20: mq paag aa-maa-si-yaa maiq Kavq mwavj. naaiq se Tinb huvb zruj Eei Jauq weig zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem ye-ho-aatg Eei puab Diaq, laaij ninb Bua lxd e-Dom Eei zyenb.
25.24: ninb zx'q Revg o-Betg-e-Dom kruj Eei Jyem Eaanb Zauj yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei yetg zuvq Jaab txvj Zauj huvb ting ka'Euad yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq. ninb yaag txb teij myenb mivb zruj txvb taaub zyrug Rwrnj saa-maa-lia zivb mig a'q.
25.28: ninb Bua lovg maad Tx ninb Eei sei Rwrnj taaib Zauj ninb Eei ovb Taaij zavj Jyenq Daa-witq Eei zivb.
25.7: maaib yetg taub Tinb huvb Eei myenb taaib Buaj aa-maa-si-yaa, “o huvb tiaj aag, Toq maiq tuvq pun i-saa-laa-en Eei pcvb kwanb Zauj meib mivb. zyruq maiq Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb yem, se maiq Zauj e-faa-im Eei haiq taub myenb yem.
25.19: meib kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia Bx'q e-Dom mig a'q.’ meib zyrug Zevb Lo, puvj waab mauj. xij zu'g pwavq Hruq meib tu'q taaib Eei Favb laavg yaag yem Jyenq pyauq maa'b! weig haiq tiug Zua'q sig pun meib kanb Zauj yu-Daa kua'q zu'g paaig?
25.17: yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-maa-si-yaa, Zauj ninb Eei Zaavb laavb myenb Zaavb laavb hxpg, aa-maa-si-yaa zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj ye-hu Eei fun, ye-ho-aa-haatg Eei txn, i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ye-ho-aatg, kxvq, “taaib maa'b! Bua i taub txij Myen Bx'q Jaaj.”
25.27: yem aa-maa-si-yaa kwavg, maiq kan zyruq, Ga'haaq yem ye-lu-saa-lem maaib myenb peig Diaq Zaavb laavb xij vcvg ninb. ninb zyrug pyauj mivb Tauj laa-Kitq zivb, mq paag ninb Bua Paaiq myenb mivb Tauj laa-Kitq, yem uaq taij ninb.
25.11: aa-maa-si-yaa zuvj Jyenq Qa'q txb ninb Eei pcv mivb Tauj Raub hxvd, yem uaq taij yetg waang taub sej-i myenb.
25.5: aa-maa-si-yaa heug yu-Daa Zauj Ben-yaa-min Eei zwavj myenb taaib zunq, zyrug ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng Paaiq ninb Bua yem yetg Zin Zauj yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb peiq Eei puab Diaq. ninb yaag saauq yetg zuvq Eig zyepg Havj faauj mcvj Eei myenb zyrug pwatg maaib pua sinj taub haib lovg tu'q Zav Zauj Txvb paaib Eei mJavg txn.
25.9: aa-maa-si-yaa naaig Tinb huvb Eei myenb, “mq paag yia pun i-saa-laa-en Eei pcvb kwanb uaq teij i Zin yetg pc'q Jxib Eaanb Navq haiq nx?” Tinb huvb Eei myenb tau, “zyruq zuvq haib Zeij pun meib kaub Zamq naaig ziaj tavb.”
25.16: trug waag myenb Zauj huvb kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang huvb tiaj kxvq, “yia Bua tu'q lyepg meib Tevj huvb tiaj Zaavb laavg fai? tivb a'q. maiq zei c'q, meib zuvq xij zu'g taig a'q.” trug waag myenb zyrug tivb mq paag cvj kxvq, “yia hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb tivg Hruq xij myetg meib, weig zu'g meib Navq naaiq nx zruj, yaag maiq mwavj yia Kwinj Eei waag.”
25.4: mq paag ninb maiq taij ninb Bua Eei txnb Jweiq weig zu'g ziuj mo-se Eei leib latg sru fiaq Jyenq zyruq hatg Eei waag kxvq, “maiq tuvq weig txnb Jweiq zruj Eei zwid taij tiaj maag. yaag maiq tuvq weig tiaj maag zruj Eei zwid taij txnb Jweiq. kx'g myenb xij zu'g weig kx'g myenb zruj Eei zwid zu'g taig.”
25.10: aa-maa-si-yaa zyrug heug yem e-faa-im kan Jyenq ninb taaib uaq teij Junb pcv Rwrnj a'q. ninb Bua nrud haig yu-Daa, Qiaj Jiad Jyenq Rwrnj mig a'q.
25.22: yu-Daa zyrug swei i-saa-laa-en. kx'g myenb pyauj Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq.
25.12: yu-Daa Eei pcv cvj zx'q tu'q yetg waang taub myenb cvj txb mivb Bcvb nivq kub vwaaig zyrug fovq ninb Bua Dxtq Fiag taaib, huq mwrng Revg.
25.15: zyruq Qiaj Jiad! haig aa-maa-si-yaa, zyrug pun taub trug waag myenb mivb kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib weig haiq tiug mivb lxd naaiq fivj myenb Eei zyenb taaib? ninb Bua zuvq maiq haib Fruj ninb Bua uaq fivj myenb pyauj Dutq meib Eei puab Diaq.
25.13: mq paag tovb aa-maa-si-yaa heug Rwrnj, maiq pun Zauj ninb Bua mivb Bx'q Jaaj uaq teij pcv, Bx'q yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb yem saa-maa-lia Tauj Betg-ho-lon. ninb Bua taij pua Zin taub myenb cvj Zaavq tu'q ka'naaiq Zamq Eei.
25.1: aa-maa-si-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q Eig zyepg Mmd Havj. ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq Eig zyepg Juaq Havj. ninb Eei maa Eei Buaj heug ye-ho-atg-Din, se ye-lu-saa-lem myenb.
25.26: aa-maa-si-yaa zruj zevg Fiag Eei sig, yem kxn Tauj setq mweid, fiaq Jyenq yu-Daa Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb trub taan.
25.25: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, ye-ho-aa-haatg Eei txn, ye-ho-aatg, kwei seij liud, yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-aatg Eei txn, aa-maa-si-yaa, Zxg zyavb Jyenq zyepg Mmd Havj.
